anya-e0703n:17: Dīpaṅkarañhi sambuddhaṃ, passitvā no jino purā;
anya-e0703n:18: Lokaṃ dukkhā pamocetuṃ, bodhāya paṇidhiṃ akā.
anya-e0703n:20: Tato tañceva sambuddhaṃ, koṇḍaññaṃ maṅgalaṃ muniṃ;
anya-e0703n:36: Uttamo gotamo buddho, satte dukkhā pamocayi.
anya-e0703n:41: Sattāhāni tahiṃ satta, so vimuttisukhaṃ paraṃ;
anya-e0703n:45: Tattha vassa vasanto’va, saṭṭhiṃ arahataṃ akā.
anya-e0703n:48: Vinetvā ca tato tiṃsa-sahā ye bhaddavaggiye.
anya-e0703n:62: Sāsanujjotanaṃ ṭhānaṃ, laṃkā ñātā jinena hi;
anya-e0703n:63: Yakkhapuṇṇāya laṅkāya, yakkhā nibbā siyāti ca.
anya-e0703n:77: Te bhayaṭṭhā’bhayaṃ yakkhā, ayācuṃ abhayaṃ jinaṃ;
anya-e0703n:78: Jino abhayado āha, yakkhe te’ti bhayaddīte.
anya-e0703n:80: Yakkhā bhayaṃ vo dukkhañca, harissāmi idaṃ ahaṃ;
anya-e0703n:81: Tumhe nisajjaṭhānaṃ me, samaggā detha no idha.
anya-e0703n:83: Āhu te sugataṃ yakkhā, dema mārisa te idha;
anya-e0703n:84: Sabbepi sakalaṃ dīpaṃ, dehi no abhayaṃ tuvaṃ.
anya-e0703n:86: Bhayaṃ sītaṃ tamaṃ tesaṃ, hantvā taṃ dinnabhūmiyaṃ;
anya-e0703n:87: Cammakkhandhaṃ attharitvā, tatthā’ sīno jino tato.
anya-e0703n:90: Ghammābhibhūtā te bhītā, ṭhitā ante samantato.
anya-e0703n:92: Giridīpaṃ tato nātho, rammaṃ tesaṃ idhā’nayi;
anya-e0703n:93: Tesu tattha paviṭṭhesu, yathāṭhāne ṭhapesi ca.
anya-e0703n:95: Nātho taṃ saṃkhipi dhammaṃ, tadā devā samāgamuṃ;
anya-e0703n:96: Tasmiṃ samāgame tesaṃ, satthā dhamma madesayi.
anya-e0703n:99: Saraṇesu ca sīlesu, ṭhitā āsuṃ asaṃkhiyā.
anya-e0703n:105: Pāṇimatteadā kese, tassa pāṇa hito jino.
anya-e0703n:137: Bodhito pañcame vasse, vasaṃ jetavane jino.
anya-e0703n:155: Datvā kālakatā nāgī, mātulena tathā hi so.
anya-e0703n:166: Devo hi so nāgadīpe, manusso’nantare bhave;
anya-e0703n:176: Idaṃ ṭhāna hitatthañca, taṃ sarukkhaṃ idhānayi.
anya-e0703n:179: Tamaṃ tamonudo tesaṃ, nāgānaṃ hiṃsanaṃ akā.
anya-e0703n:182: Te disvā sugataṃ tuṭṭhā, pāde vandiṃsu satthuno.
anya-e0703n:185: Ubho’pi te patītā taṃ, pallaṅkaṃ munino aduṃ.
anya-e0703n:194: Kalyāṇiyaṃ nāgarājā, yuddhaṃ kātuṃ tahiṃ gato.
anya-e0703n:199: Mahatī anukampāno, katā nātha tayā ayaṃ;
anya-e0703n:202: Anukampā mahī pite, visuṃ hotu mahodaya;
anya-e0703n:212: Taṃ bhavissati votātā, hitāya ca sukhāya ca.
anya-e0703n:224: Bodhito aṭṭhame vasse, vasaṃ jetavane jino;
anya-e0703n:240: Uggantvā sumane kūṭe, padaṃ dassesi nāyako.
anya-e0703n:260: Evaṃ laṅkāya nātho, hitamamitamatī āyatiṃ pekkhamāno;
anya-e0703n:274: Rojo ca vararojo ca, tathā kalyāṇakā duve;
anya-e0703n:278: Mucalindo sāgaro ceva, sāgaro deva vanāmako.
anya-e0703n:280: Bharato bhagīratho ceva, ruci ca suruci pica;
anya-e0703n:281: Patāpo mahāpatāpo, panādā ca tathā duve.
anya-e0703n:283: Sudassano ca neru ca, tathā eva duve duve;
anya-e0703n:289: Tato satañca rājano, chappaññāsa ca saṭṭhi ca;
anya-e0703n:290: Caturāsīti sahassāni, chattiṃsā ca tato pare.
anya-e0703n:292: Dvattiṃsa aṭṭhavīsā ca, dvāvīsati tato pare;
anya-e0703n:295: Nava satta dvādasa ca, pañcavīsa tatopare;
anya-e0703n:296: Pañcavīsaṃ dvādasa ca, dvādasañca navā pica.
anya-e0703n:301: Soḷasa yāva okkātaṃ, paputtā rāsito ime;
anya-e0703n:302: Visuṃ visuṃ pure rajjaṃ, kamato anusāsisuṃ.
anya-e0703n:305: Nipuro candīmā candaṃ-mukho ca sivi sañjayo.
anya-e0703n:308: Sīhassaro ca iccete, tassa putta pa puttakā.
anya-e0703n:311: Putta pa putta rājāno, jayaseno tadantimo.
anya-e0703n:319: Añjano cā’tha kaccānā, āsuṃ tassa sutā duve;
anya-e0703n:323: Añjanassa duve dhītā, māyā cātha pajāpati.
anya-e0703n:325: Puttā duve daṇḍapāṇī, suppabuddho ca sākiyo;
anya-e0703n:326: Pañca puttā duve dhītā, āsuṃ sīhahanussare.
anya-e0703n:329: Amitā pamitācā’ti, ime pañca imā duve.
anya-e0703n:335: Suddhodana mahārañño, putto māyāya so jino.
anya-e0703n:338: Evaṃ pavatte sañjāto, sabba khatthiya muddhani.
anya-e0703n:344: Ubhinnaṃ pitaro cāpi, sahāyāeva te ahuṃ.
anya-e0703n:349: Padahitvāna chabbassaṃ, bodhiṃ patvā kamena ca;
anya-e0703n:353: Abhisitto mahāpañño, patto rajjassa tassa tu.
anya-e0703n:356: Dvāpaññāseva vassāni, rajjaṃ kāresi so pana.
anya-e0703n:365: Pacchā so kārayī rajjaṃ, vassāni catuvīsati.
anya-e0703n:378: Ṭhatvā sabbāni kiccāni, katvā lokassa sabbathā.
anya-e0703n:384: Khattiyā brāhmaṇā vassā, suddhā devā tatheva ca.
anya-e0703n:405: Sammanni kātuṃ saṃgītiṃ, sā na sakkā hi taṃ vinā.
anya-e0703n:429: Rājā katthāti pucchitvā, vuttaṭhānamhi tehi so.
anya-e0703n:434: Sabbathā maṇḍayitvā taṃ, attharāpesi tattha so;
anya-e0703n:443: Rājā’rocayi therānaṃ, kammaṃ no niṭṭhitaṃ iti;
anya-e0703n:446: Sve sannipāto ānanda, sekhena gamanaṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:447: Na yuttante sadatthe tvaṃ, appamatto tato bhava.
anya-e0703n:449: Iccevaṃ codito thero, katvāna vīriyaṃ samaṃ;
anya-e0703n:452: Vassānaṃ dutiye māse, dutiye divase pana;
anya-e0703n:453: Rucire maṇḍape tasmiṃ, therā sannipatiṃsu te.
anya-e0703n:498: Te yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā, therā sabbepi nibbutā.
anya-e0703n:529: Kāḷāso ko tassa putto, aṭṭhavīsati kārayi.
anya-e0703n:541: Taṃ sutvāna yasatthero, evaṃ vajjīsu cārikaṃ.
anya-e0703n:549: Na kappate taṃ mā detha, iti thero savārayi;
anya-e0703n:552: Yācitvā anudūtaṃ so, saha tena puraṃ gato;
anya-e0703n:558: Thero uggamma nabhasā, gantvā kosambiyaṃ tato;
anya-e0703n:567: Bhikkhavo sannipatitā, sabbe tattha tato tato;
anya-e0703n:571: Taṃ kālapamukhaṃ ñatvā, passituṃ nikkhamiṃsu taṃ.
anya-e0703n:573: Thero tammantanaṃ sutvā, vesāliṃ gantumeva so;
anya-e0703n:594: Upecca taṃ mahābrahmā, dhamme niṭṭhāti abravi;
anya-e0703n:595: Niccaṃ dhamme ṭhitattaṃ so, attano tassa abravi.
anya-e0703n:598: Thero na gaṇhi tappakkha-gāhī sissaṃ paṇāmayī.
anya-e0703n:600: Vesāliṃ te tato gantvā, tato pupphapuraṃ gatā;
anya-e0703n:603: Satthussa no gandhakuṭiṃ, gopayanto mayaṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:613: Navutiñca sahassāni, ahu taṃ vatthu santiyā.
anya-e0703n:616: Thero sabbepi bhikkhū te, vesālimāgamuṃ tato.
anya-e0703n:621: Pesetvā te mahīpālo, taṃ rattiṃ supinenaso;
anya-e0703n:624: Atibhīto ahu rājā, tamassā setu māgamā;
anya-e0703n:627: Bhāriyaṃ te kataṃ kammaṃ, dhammike’yye khamāpaya;
anya-e0703n:628: Pakkho tesaṃ bhavitvā tvaṃ, kuru sāsanapaggahaṃ.
anya-e0703n:630: Evaṃ kate sotthi tuyhaṃ, hessatīti apakkami;
anya-e0703n:636: Khamāpetvā dhammike te, bhikkhū sabbe mahīpati;
anya-e0703n:640: Datvā ca tesaṃ ārakkhaṃ, agamāsi sakaṃ puraṃ.
anya-e0703n:642: Nicchetuṃ tāni vatthūni, saṅgho sannipatī tadā;
anya-e0703n:646: Ubbhāhikāya taṃ vatthuṃ, sametuṃ nicchayaṃ akā.
anya-e0703n:649: Ubbhāhikāya sammanni, bhikkhū taṃ vatthu santiyā.
anya-e0703n:662: Daharenā’ji te nettha, paññatte āsane subhe;
anya-e0703n:665: Tesu vatthūsu ekekaṃ, kamato revato mahā;
anya-e0703n:666: Thero theraṃ sabbakāmiṃ, pucchi pucchāsu kovido.
anya-e0703n:669: Sabbāni tāni vatthūni, na kappantīti suttato.
anya-e0703n:686: Vāsabhagāmiko ceva, sumano ca duve pana.
anya-e0703n:689: Aṭṭha therā’pi dhaññā te, diṭṭhapubbā tathāgataṃ.
anya-e0703n:703: Pubbe kataṃ tathā eva, dhammaṃ pacchā ca bhāsitaṃ;
anya-e0703n:704: Ādāya niṭṭhapesuṃ taṃ, etaṃ māsehi aṭṭhahi.
anya-e0703n:735: Vajjīputtakabhikkhū ca, duve jātā ime khalu.
anya-e0703n:741: Dhammaguttiyabhikkhū ca, jātā khalu ime duve.
anya-e0703n:744: Jātā saṅkantikā bhikkhū, suttavādā tato pana.
anya-e0703n:746: Theravādena saha te, honti dvādasi’mepi ca;
anya-e0703n:747: Pubbe vuttachavādā ca, iti aṭṭhārasā khilā.
anya-e0703n:763: Nava nandā tato āsuṃ, kameneva narādhipā;
anya-e0703n:775: Bindusārasutā āsuṃ, sataṃ eko ca vissutā;
anya-e0703n:778: Vemātike bhātaro so, hantvā ekūnakaṃ sataṃ;
anya-e0703n:788: Yojane yojane āṇā, niccaṃ pavattitā ahu.
anya-e0703n:791: Devā devo akā tehi, saṃvibhāgaṃ janassaca.
anya-e0703n:815: Akaṃsu mūsikā tehi, bhattaṃ rājakule ahu.
anya-e0703n:830: Bhojesi sopi teyeva, tīṇi vassāni bhojayi.
anya-e0703n:842: Sumanassa kumārassa, putto so hi kumārako.
anya-e0703n:847: Katvā puraṃ sakāyattaṃ, mate pitari bhātaraṃ;
anya-e0703n:848: Ghātetvā jeṭṭhakaṃ rajjaṃ, aggahesi pure vare.
anya-e0703n:856: Tadahe’va varaṃ puttaṃ, vijāyitvā sutassa sā;
anya-e0703n:859: Disvā taṃ jeṭṭhacaṇḍālo, attano sāminiṃ viya;
anya-e0703n:862: Taṃ mahāvaruṇo thero, tadā disvā kumārakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:874: Pubbe kira tayo āsuṃ, bhātaro madhu vāṇijā;
anya-e0703n:875: Eko madhuṃ vikkiṇāti, āharanti madhuṃ duve.
anya-e0703n:881: Titthaṃ jalatthaṃ gacchanti, ekā ceṭī tamaddasa.
anya-e0703n:884: Eso madhvāpaṇo bhante, tattha gacchā’ti abravi.
anya-e0703n:886: Tattha pattassa buddhassa, vāṇijo so pasādavā;
anya-e0703n:890: Disvā madhuṃ pasanno so, evaṃ paṇidahī tadā.
anya-e0703n:893: Ākāse yojane āṇā, bhūmiyaṃ yojaneti ca.
anya-e0703n:895: Bhātare āgate āha, edisassa madhuṃ adaṃ;
anya-e0703n:896: Anumodatha tumhe taṃ, tumhākañca yato madhu.
anya-e0703n:906: Āpaṇā desikaṃ yātu, devittaṃ tassa patthayi;
anya-e0703n:912: Caṇḍālavādī caṇḍāla-gāme āsi yato tu so;
anya-e0703n:913: Patthesi mokkhaṃ mokkhañca, satta vassova pāpuṇi.
anya-e0703n:915: Niviṭṭhapemo tasmiṃ so, rājā’ti turito tato;
anya-e0703n:916: Pakkosāpesi taṃ so tu, santavuttī upāgami.
anya-e0703n:922: Ajjā’yaṃ sāmaṇero me, ghare hessati sāmiko.
anya-e0703n:924: Ālambitvā karaṃ rañño, so pallaṅke samāruhi;
anya-e0703n:927: Disvā tathā nisinnaṃ taṃ, asoko so mahīpati;
anya-e0703n:934: Taṃ sutvā bhūmipālo so, pasanno jinasāsane.
anya-e0703n:936: Aṭṭha te niccabhattāni, dammi tātā’ti āha taṃ;
anya-e0703n:937: Upajjhāyassa me rāja, tāni dammīti āha so.
anya-e0703n:939: Puna aṭṭhasu dinnesu, tāna’dā cariyassa so;
anya-e0703n:945: Sahatthā tappito raññā, dhammaṃ desiya bhūpatiṃ;
anya-e0703n:950: Tato rājā pasanno so, diguṇena dine dine;
anya-e0703n:960: Gharaṃ netvāna bhojetvā, datvā sāmaṇakaṃ bahuṃ.
anya-e0703n:975: Paccekaṃ satasahassaṃ, so dāpesi dine dine.
anya-e0703n:984: Te piṭakānaṃ therānaṃ, saṭṭhiye’kaṃ dine dine.
anya-e0703n:1002: Rūpaṃ anantañāṇassa, dassehi mama bho iti.
anya-e0703n:1008: Taṃ disvā’ti pasādassa, vimhayassa ca pūrito.
anya-e0703n:1010: Etena nimmitaṃ rūpaṃ, īdisaṃ kīdisaṃ nukho;
anya-e0703n:1016: Evaṃ mahānubhāvo ca, saddho cāpi mahīpati;
anya-e0703n:1017: Thero ca moggaliputto, diṭṭhā pubbe vasīhi te.
anya-e0703n:1034: Upaddavo sāsanassa, na sambhossāma taṃ mayaṃ.
anya-e0703n:1042: Kāle tumhesu eko taṃ, pabbājetu kumārakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1057: Vedesu gaṇṭhiṭhānāni, pucchi so tāni byākari.
anya-e0703n:1060: Sabbe dhammā osaranti, ekadhammo hi ko nu so.
anya-e0703n:1062: Iccāha nāmaṃ sandhāya, thero māṇavako tu so;
anya-e0703n:1065: Dehīti āha so āha, dema no vesadhārino;
anya-e0703n:1066: Guruṃ āpucchi mantatthaṃ, mātaraṃ pitaraṃ tathā.
anya-e0703n:1083: Sagaṇaṃ dāsakaṃ theraṃ, tattha disvā pasīdiya;
anya-e0703n:1084: Pabbajjaṃ yāci so āha, tavā’puccha guruṃ iti.
anya-e0703n:1114: Pāhesuṃ saṅghavacanaṃ, vuṭṭhāya sa tahiṃ agā.
anya-e0703n:1116: Kumāro pucchi kiṃ bhante, nālapitthāti āha so;
anya-e0703n:1117: Bhuñjimha bhuñjitabbanti, āha bhojetha no api.
anya-e0703n:1119: Āha amhādise jāhe, sakkā bhojayituṃ iti;
anya-e0703n:1128: Ñatvā tissa paṭisandhiṃ, tato pabhuti siggavo;
anya-e0703n:1129: Thero so sattavassāni, taṃ gharaṃ upasaṅkami.
anya-e0703n:1132: Alattha aṭṭhame vasse, gacchāti vacanaṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:1135: Kiñci laddhaṃ ghare noti, pucchi āmāti so’bravi.
anya-e0703n:1137: Gharaṃ gantvāna pucchitvā, dutiye divase tato;
anya-e0703n:1140: Therassa vacanaṃ sutvā, so pasannamano dvijo;
anya-e0703n:1144: Bhojāpesi dijo niccaṃ, nisīdāpiya taṃ ghare.
anya-e0703n:1153: Tasmā so tassa pallaṅko, vāsayitvā lagīyati.
anya-e0703n:1156: Tassa taṃ āsanaṃ tassa, paññapesi ghare jano.
anya-e0703n:1161: Thero māṇava kiṃ mantaṃ, jānāsīti tamabravi;
anya-e0703n:1162: Tameva pucchaṃ therassa, pacchā rocesi māṇavo.
anya-e0703n:1173: Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhisati na uppajjissati;
anya-e0703n:1176: Taṃ cittayamake pañhaṃ, pucchi thero visārado;
anya-e0703n:1177: Andhakāro viya ahu, tassa so tamavoca so.
anya-e0703n:1179: Bhikkhuko nāma mantoti, buddha mantoti so bravi;
anya-e0703n:1180: Dehīti vutte novesa-dhārino dammi taṃ iti.
anya-e0703n:1186: Sotāphattiphalaṃ patto, thero ñatvāna taṃ tathā.
anya-e0703n:1198: Ekāhaṃ uparājā so, adakkhi migavaṃ gato;
anya-e0703n:1204: Attano cintitaṃ rañño, ārocesi gharaṃ gato;
anya-e0703n:1205: Saññāpetuṃ tu sattāhaṃ, rajjaṃ tassa adāsi so.
anya-e0703n:1207: Anubhohi ime rajjaṃ, sattāhaṃ tvaṃ kumāraka;
anya-e0703n:1215: Sattāhā’haṃ marissaṃti, tvaṃ na kīḷi ime kathaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1218: Iccevaṃ bhākarā vutto, sāsanasmiṃ pasīdi so;
anya-e0703n:1224: Ayaṃ thero viyā’hampi, pabbajja jina sāsane;
anya-e0703n:1225: Viharissaṃ kadā raññe, iti cintayi paññavā.
anya-e0703n:1235: Taṃ iddhiṃ uparājā so, disvā’tīva pasīdiya;
anya-e0703n:1267: Janena paribhuttesu, ṭhānesu ca tahiṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:1276: Pure bheriṃ carāpesi, sattame divase ito;
anya-e0703n:1300: Tasmiṃ samāgame āsuṃ, asīti bhikkhukoṭi yo;
anya-e0703n:1304: Khiṇāsavā bhikkhuniyo, sahassaṃ āsu tāsu tu.
anya-e0703n:1313: Passi sabbe vihāre ca, nānāpūjā vibhūsite.
anya-e0703n:1315: Atīva tuṭṭho te disvā, saṅghaṃ pucchi nisīdiya;
anya-e0703n:1318: Thero so moggaliputto, rañño pañhaṃ viyākari;
anya-e0703n:1321: Taṃ sutvā vacanaṃ bhiyyo, tuṭṭho rājā apucchi taṃ;
anya-e0703n:1322: Buddhasāsana dāyādo, hoti kho mādiso iti.
anya-e0703n:1341: Pabbajissatha kiṃ tātā, pabbajjā mahatī matā;
anya-e0703n:1342: Pituno vacanaṃ sutvā, pitaraṃ te abhāsisuṃ.
anya-e0703n:1344: Ajjeva pabbajissāma, sace tvaṃ deva icchasi;
anya-e0703n:1354: Pabbajjā pesi samahaṃ, saṅgha mittañca dhītaraṃ.
anya-e0703n:1360: Pabbajjā sikkhādānañca, tassā ca tadahu ahu.
anya-e0703n:1377: Sā bhikkhunī candalekhā, mahindo bhikkhū sūriyo;
anya-e0703n:1378: Sambuddha sāsanākāsaṃ, te sadā sobhayuṃ tadā.
anya-e0703n:1392: Āha puṭṭho kaṇiṭṭhena, bhesajjaṃ pasataṃ ghaṭaṃ.
anya-e0703n:1397: Piṇḍāya ce caraṃ sappiṃ, labhase tvaṃ tamāhara;
anya-e0703n:1400: Piṇḍāya caratā tena, na laddhaṃ pasataṃ ghataṃ;
anya-e0703n:1422: Mā hotu bhikkhusaṅghassa, bhesajjaṃ dullabhaṃ iti.
anya-e0703n:1432: Tato pabhuti saṅghassa, lābho’tīva mahā ahu;
anya-e0703n:1433: Pacchā pasannā ca janā, yasmā lābhaṃ pavattayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:1452: Titthiyānaṃ bahucattā ca, dubbaccattā ca bhikkhavo;
anya-e0703n:1453: Tesaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhiṃsu, dhammena paṭisedhanaṃ.
anya-e0703n:1467: Uposathaṃ tittiyehi, na karoma mayaṃ iti;
anya-e0703n:1468: Avo ca bhikkhusaṅgho taṃ, amaccaṃ mūḷhamānasaṃ.
anya-e0703n:1473: Rājabhātā tissatthero, taṃ disvā kiriyaṃ lahuṃ;
anya-e0703n:1474: Gantvāna tassa āsanne, sāsanamhi nisidi so.
anya-e0703n:1476: Theraṃ disvā amacco so, gantvā rañño nivedayi;
anya-e0703n:1477: Sabbaṃ pavattiṃ taṃ sutvā, jātadāho mahīpati.
anya-e0703n:1480: Evaṃ katena kammena, kassa pāpaṃ siyā iti.
anya-e0703n:1482: Tesaṃ apaṇḍitā keci, pāpaṃ tuyhanti keci tu;
anya-e0703n:1485: Taṃ sutvā’ha mahārājā, samattho atthi bhikkhuna;
anya-e0703n:1497: Theraṃ ānetu me tehi, tathā vutte sanāgami.
anya-e0703n:1499: Taṃ sutvā puna aṭṭha’ttha, there’macce ca pesayi;
anya-e0703n:1502: Rājā pucchi kathaṃ thero, āgaccheyya nu kho iti;
anya-e0703n:1506: Iti vutte mahārāja, thero essati so iti.
anya-e0703n:1508: Punāpi thero’macce ca, rājā soḷasa soḷasa;
anya-e0703n:1509: Visuṃ sahassa purise, tathā vatvāna pesayi.
anya-e0703n:1512: Theraṃ gaṅgāya nāvāya, ānethā’ti ca abravi.
anya-e0703n:1526: Therassa pāde dhovitvā, makkhetvā ca nisīdiya.
anya-e0703n:1531: Kanti vutte mahīkampaṃ, āha taṃ puna rāhaso;
anya-e0703n:1534: Ko dukkaroti pucchitvā, eka desāya kampanaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1540: Ṭhapāpetvā tadaḍḍhehi, saha taṃ yojanaṃ mahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:1541: Cālesi iddhiyā tatra, nisinnassa ca dassayi.
anya-e0703n:1546: Paṭicca kammaṃ natthīti, kiliṭṭhaṃ cetanaṃ vinā;
anya-e0703n:1552: Tasmiṃyeva ca sattā he, duve yakkhe mahīpati;
anya-e0703n:1561: Kiṃvādī sugato bhante, iti pucchi mahīpati;
anya-e0703n:1567: Apucchi dhammike bhikkhū, kiṃvādī sugato iti;
anya-e0703n:1568: Vibhajjavādī tāhaṃsu, taṃ theraṃ pucchi bhūpati.
anya-e0703n:1580: Saṅghassa rakkhaṃ datvāna, nagaraṃ pāvisī subhaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1590: Yathā te dhamma saṃgītiṃ, tissattheropi taṃ tathā.
anya-e0703n:1593: Abhāsi tissatthero ca, tasmiṃ saṃgīti maṇḍale.
anya-e0703n:1596: Ayaṃ navahi māsehi, dhamma saṃgīti niṭṭhitā.
anya-e0703n:1617: So rājā deviyā tassā, ekaṃ alabhi dhītaraṃ;
anya-e0703n:1629: Gaṇhitvā gocaraṃ sīho, gacchaṃ disvā tamā’rato;
anya-e0703n:1632: Sā taṃ disvā saritvāna, nemittavacanaṃ sutaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1636: Sīho sakaṃ guhaṃ netvā, tāya saṃvāsamācari.
anya-e0703n:1644: Putto soḷasavasso so, mātaraṃ pucchi saṃsayaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1645: Tuvaṃ pitā ca no amma, kasmā visadisā iti.
anya-e0703n:1654: Vāme kaṇiṭṭhiṃ katvāna, tayo sīghaṃ apakkamī.
anya-e0703n:1662: Disvā te pucchite’vocuṃ, aṭavī vāsino mayaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1663: Iti so dāpayī tesaṃ, vatthāni dhajinī pati.
anya-e0703n:1668: Tena so vimhito pucchi, ke tumheti camūpati;
anya-e0703n:1671: Pitucchā dhītaraṃ taṃ so, ādāya dhajinī pati;
anya-e0703n:1674: Sīho sīghaṃ guhaṃ gantvā, te adisvā tayo jane;
anya-e0703n:1675: Aṭṭito puttasokena, na ca khādi na cā’pivi.
anya-e0703n:1678: Ubbāsīyati so so’va, yaṃyaṃ gāmamupeti so.
anya-e0703n:1681: Sīho piḷeti te raṭṭhaṃ, taṃ deva paṭisedhaya.
anya-e0703n:1687: Dvīsu vāresu vāresi, mātā sīhabhujaṃ hitaṃ.
anya-e0703n:1690: Mātaraṃ tisahassaṃ taṃ, ghātetuṃ pitaraṃ sakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:1692: Rañño kumāraṃ dassesuṃ, taṃ rājā idha mabravi;
anya-e0703n:1693: Gahito yadi sīho te, dammi raṭṭhaṃ tadeva te.
anya-e0703n:1695: So taṃ gantvā guhādvāraṃ, sīhaṃ disvāva ārakā;
anya-e0703n:1696: Entaṃ puttasinehena, vijjhituṃ taṃ saraṃ khipi.
anya-e0703n:1702: Tato khitto sarotassa, kāyaṃ nibbijja nikkhami.
anya-e0703n:1707: Rañño aputtakattā ca, patītā cassa kammunā;
anya-e0703n:1708: Sutvā ca rañño nattuttaṃ, sañjānitvā ca mātaraṃ.
anya-e0703n:1713: So rajjaṃ sampaṭicchitvā, datvā mātu patissa taṃ;
anya-e0703n:1716: Nagaraṃ tattha māpesi, ahu sīhapuranti taṃ;
anya-e0703n:1722: Mahesī soḷasakkhattuṃ, yamake ca duve duve;
anya-e0703n:1723: Putte janayi kālesā, vijayo nāma jeṭṭhako.
anya-e0703n:1725: Sumitto nāma dutiyo, sabbe dvattiṃsa puttakā;
anya-e0703n:1732: Rājā te saññapetvāna, puttaṃ ovadi sādhukaṃ.
anya-e0703n:1734: Sabbaṃ tatheva dutiyaṃ, ahosi tatiyaṃ pana;
anya-e0703n:1735: Kuddho mahājano āha, puttaṃ ghātehi te iti.
anya-e0703n:1741: Tathā tesaṃ bhariyāyo, tatheva ca kumārake.
anya-e0703n:1744: Visuṃ visuṃ dīpakasmiṃ, okkamiṃsu vasiṃsu ca.
anya-e0703n:1785: Na santi manujā hettha, na ca hessati vo bhayaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1786: Iti vatvā kuṇḍīkāya, te jalena nisiñciya.
anya-e0703n:1794: Tassā ca sāmīnī tattha, kuveṇīnāma yakkhinī;
anya-e0703n:1797: Disvāna so pokkharaṇī, nisinnaṃ tañca tāpasiṃ;
anya-e0703n:1798: Tattha nhātvā pivitvā ca, ādāya ca mulāliyo.
anya-e0703n:1801: Bhakkho’si mama tiṭṭhāti, aṭṭhā baddho vaso naro.
anya-e0703n:1803: Parittasutta tejena, bhakkhituṃ sā na sakkuṇī;
anya-e0703n:1806: Taṃ gahetvā suruṅgāyaṃ, rudantaṃ yakkhinī khipi;
anya-e0703n:1820: Yakkhinī tāva jānāti, mama jātinti nicchito;
anya-e0703n:1821: Saṅghaṃ sanāmaṃ sāvetvā, dhanuṃ sandhāyu’ pāgato.
anya-e0703n:1823: Yakkhiṃ ādāya gīvāya, nārā ca valayena so;
anya-e0703n:1824: Vāmahatthena kesesu, gahetvā dakkhiṇe na tu.
anya-e0703n:1829: Jīvitaṃ dehi me sāmi, rajjaṃ dajjāmi te ahaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1832: Adubbhātthāya sapathaṃ, so taṃ yakkhiṃ akārayi;
anya-e0703n:1856: Apucchi sahasemānaṃ, kiṃ saddo iti yakkhiniṃ.
anya-e0703n:1858: Rajjañca sāmino deyyaṃ, sabbe yakkhe ca ghātiya;
anya-e0703n:1861: Iti cintiya yakkhī sā, abravi rājanandanaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1865: Kumārikā idhā’nītā, tassā mātā ca āgatā.
anya-e0703n:1867: Āvāha maṅgale tattha, idhāpi ussave mahā;
anya-e0703n:1875: Yattha saddaṃ karissāma, tena saddena ghātaya;
anya-e0703n:1878: Tassā sutvā tathā katvā, sabbe yakkhe aghātayi;
anya-e0703n:1891: So desoceva dīpo ca, tena tannāmako ahu.
anya-e0703n:1894: Sīhaḷo tena sambandhā, ete sabbepi sīhaḷā.
anya-e0703n:1896: Tattha tattha ca gāme te, tassā’maccā nivesayuṃ;
anya-e0703n:1902: Aññe tayo amaccā te, māpayiṃsu visuṃ visuṃ;
anya-e0703n:1908: Iti vutto rājaputto, na icchi abhisecanaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1911: Athāmaccā sāmino he, abhiseka katā darā;
anya-e0703n:1918: Aññesaṃ cāpi dhītatthaṃ, amaccānaṃ janassa ca.
anya-e0703n:1920: Sīghaṃ nāvāya gantvāna, dūtā te madhuraṃ puraṃ;
anya-e0703n:1921: Paṇṇākāre ca lekhañca, tassa rañño adassayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:1932: Evaṃ laddhā bahūkaññā, tappayitvāna taṃ kulaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1935: Sabbā tā laddhasakkārā, kaññāyo ca yathārahaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1947: ‘‘Gaccha dāni tuvaṃ bhoti, ṭhapetvā puttake duve;
anya-e0703n:1950: Sutvā taṃ yakkhabhayato, bhītaṃ taṃ āha yakkhiniṃ;
anya-e0703n:1951: Mā cintayi sāhassena, dāpayissāmi te baliṃ.
anya-e0703n:1953: Punappunaṃ taṃ yācitvā, ubho ādāya puttake;
anya-e0703n:1956: Putte bihi nisīdetvā, sayaṃ pāvisi taṃ puraṃ;
anya-e0703n:1957: Sañjānitvāna taṃ yakkhiṃ, bhītā corīti saññito.
anya-e0703n:1959: Saṃkhubhiṃsu pure yakkhā, eko sāhasiko pana;
anya-e0703n:1962: Tassātu mātulo yakkho, nikkhamma nagarā bahi;
anya-e0703n:1963: Disvā te dārake pucchi, tumhe kassa sutā iti.
anya-e0703n:1965: Kuveṇiyā’ti sutvā’ha, mātā vo māritā idha;
anya-e0703n:1966: Tumhepi disvā māreyyuṃ, palāyatha lahuṃ iti.
anya-e0703n:1968: Āguṃ sumanakūṭaṃ te, palāyitvā tato lahuṃ;
anya-e0703n:1969: Vāsaṃ kappesi jeṭṭho so, vuddho tāya kaṇiṭṭhiyā.
anya-e0703n:1978: Adā yāthārahaṃ kaññā, amaccānaṃ janassa ca.
anya-e0703n:1980: Yathā vidhi ca vijayaṃ, sabbe maccāsamāgatā;
anya-e0703n:1983: Tato so vijayo rājā, paṇḍurājassa dhītaraṃ;
anya-e0703n:1999: Vijayo so mahārājā, vasse antimake ṭhito;
anya-e0703n:2000: Iti cintayi ‘‘vuddho’haṃ, na ca vijjati me suto.
anya-e0703n:2002: Kicchena vāsitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ, nasseyya mama accaye;
anya-e0703n:2006: Lekhaṃ datvāna vijayo, na cirena divaṅgato.
anya-e0703n:2008: Tasmiṃ mate amaccā te, pekkhantā khattiyāgamaṃ;
anya-e0703n:2012: Ekaṃ vassaṃ ayaṃ laṃkā-dīpo āsi arājako.
anya-e0703n:2015: Accayena sumitto so, rājā tassa suto ahu.
anya-e0703n:2017: Tassa puttā tayo āsuṃ, maddarājassa dhītuyā;
anya-e0703n:2018: Dūtā sīhapuraṃ gantvā, rañño lekhaṃ adaṃsu te.
anya-e0703n:2020: Lekhaṃ sutvāna so rājā, putte āmantayī tayo;
anya-e0703n:2021: Ahaṃ mahallako tātā, eko tumhesu gacchatu.
anya-e0703n:2023: Laṃkaṃ nekaguṇaṃ kantaṃ, mama bhātussa santakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:2024: Tassa’cca yena tattheva, rajjaṃ kāretu sobhanaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2033: Te paribbājake disvā, jano sakkari sādhukaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2035: Pucchitvā nagaraṃ ettha, upayantaṃ kamena te;
anya-e0703n:2039: Khattiyā’gamanaṃ tassa, so byākāsi paraṃpi ca.
anya-e0703n:2045: Patte disvāna pucchitvā, amaccā te vijāniya.
anya-e0703n:2051: Ñatvā vināsaṃ sakyānaṃ, so ādāya sakaṃ janaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2054: Māpetvā tattha kāresi, rajjaṃ tassa sute labhi.
anya-e0703n:2060: Pesesuṃ rājino tassa, bhīto rājūhi so pana.
anya-e0703n:2065: Gaṅgāya khipi gaṇhātu, pahu me dhītaraṃ iti;
anya-e0703n:2066: Gahetuṃ te na sakkhiṃsu, nāvāsāpana sīghagā.
anya-e0703n:2069: Pattāpabbajitā kārā, sabbā tā tattha otaruṃ.
anya-e0703n:2074: Nemittakassa vacanaṃ, sutvā tatthā’gatā tu tā;
anya-e0703n:2075: Disvā amacco pucchitvā, ñatvā rañño samappayi.
anya-e0703n:2090: Mahesī janayī putte, dasa ekañca dhītaraṃ;
anya-e0703n:2097: Vāresi kāle vāsesuṃ, gehaṃ taṃ ekathuṇike.
anya-e0703n:2100: Anto ṭhapesuṃ ekañca, dāsiṃ narasataṃ bahi.
anya-e0703n:2109: Disvāna taṃ kaniṭṭhiñca, roditvā saha tāya ca.
anya-e0703n:2120: Kāresi anurādho so, vāpiṃ dakkhiṇato tato;
anya-e0703n:2144: Evaṃ niccaṃ vasī tattha, chiddābhāvā apākaṭo.
anya-e0703n:2146: Sā tena aggahī gabbhaṃ, gabbhe pariṇate tato;
anya-e0703n:2147: Mātu ārocayī dāsī, mātā pucchiya dhītaraṃ.
anya-e0703n:2150: Posiyoso’pi amhehi, deva tasseva taṃ iti.
anya-e0703n:2152: Putto ce mārayissāma, ta’nti tassa adaṃsu taṃ;
anya-e0703n:2158: Te paṭiññaṃ adente te, rājaputtā aghātayuṃ;
anya-e0703n:2159: Yakkhā hutvāna rakkhiṃsu, ubho gabbhe kumārakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2161: Aññaṃ upavijaññaṃ sā, sallakkhā pesi dāsiyā;
anya-e0703n:2162: Cittā sā janayī puttaṃ, sā itthi pana dhītaraṃ.
anya-e0703n:2164: Cittaṃ sahassaṃ dāpetvā, tassā puttaṃ sakampi ca;
anya-e0703n:2167: Dhītā laddhā’ti sutvāna, tuṭṭhā rājasutā ahuṃ;
anya-e0703n:2168: Mātā ca mātumātā ca, ubho pana kumārakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2174: Tiṃsa vassamhi jātamhi, mato so paṇḍukābhaye.
anya-e0703n:2190: Disvā dāsiṃ kuhiṃ yāsi, kiṃ me kanti ca pucchisuṃ.
anya-e0703n:2195: Citto ca kālavelo ca, tassā’rakkhāya niggatā;
anya-e0703n:2201: Tasmiṃyeva dine tassa, bhariyā janayī sutaṃ;
anya-e0703n:2202: Yamake janayī putte, bhariyaṃ me’ti positaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2204: So sattavassiko cā’si, taṃ vijāniya mātulā;
anya-e0703n:2205: Gantuṃ sarasi kīḷante, dārake ca payojayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:2214: Kumāro vārimo gayha, susiramhi ṭhito ahu.
anya-e0703n:2217: Gantvā ārocayuṃ sabbe, dārakā māritā iti.
anya-e0703n:2219: Gatesu tesu so gantvā, āyuttakagharaṃ sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:2222: Puna sutvāna jīvantaṃ, kumāraṃ tassa mātulaṃ;
anya-e0703n:2225: Tasmiṃ ahani gopālā, laddhā ekaṃ catuppadaṃ;
anya-e0703n:2226: Aggiṃ āharituṃ gāmaṃ, pesetuṃ taṃ kumārakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2229: Pādā rujanti me tehi, aggiṃ gopālasantikaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2233: Ne si so taṃ vaco sutvā,
anya-e0703n:2236: Tasmiṃ khaṇe pesitā te, parikkhipiya mārayuṃ;
anya-e0703n:2239: Tatho soḷasavassaṃ taṃ, vijāniṃsu ca mātulā;
anya-e0703n:2251: Tassa katvāna sakkāraṃ, āha rājā bhavissasi;
anya-e0703n:2255: Candena tassa puttena, khippaṃ sippaṃ samāpitaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2260: Siyuṃ yāya gayitāni, paṇṇāni kanakāni taṃ;
anya-e0703n:2263: Ibhi vatvā dhanaṃ datvā, sayodhaṃ nihari tato;
anya-e0703n:2264: So nāmaṃ sāvayitvāna, tato nikkhamma puññavā.
anya-e0703n:2275: So karisasataṃ pakkaṃ, tadā lāveti khattiyo;
anya-e0703n:2276: Tassa dhītā rūpavatī, pālī nāmā’si khattiyā.
anya-e0703n:2284: Dvedhā taṃ parisaṃ katvā, sataṃ yānamapesayi;
anya-e0703n:2299: Sabbe bhojāpayī tesā, taṃ na khīyittha bhojanaṃ;
anya-e0703n:2308: Taṃ sutvāna pitā tassā, nare sabbe apesayi;
anya-e0703n:2309: Te gantvā kalahaṃ katvā, tajjitā tehi āgamuṃ.
anya-e0703n:2311: Kalahanagaraṃ nāma, gāmo tattha kate ahu;
anya-e0703n:2322: Tattha cattāri vassāni, vasi taṃ tattha mātulā;
anya-e0703n:2329: Tesañca khandhāvāramhi, duve vassāni so vasī.
anya-e0703n:2335: Taṃ sutvā tassa kujjiṃsu, bhātaro nava rājino.
anya-e0703n:2337: Upatthambho tvamevā’si, ciraṃ tassa idāni tu;
anya-e0703n:2338: Raṭṭhaṃ dadāsi tasmā tvaṃ, māressāmā’ti abravuṃ.
anya-e0703n:2340: So tesaṃ rajjamappesi, te tissaṃ nāma bhātaraṃ;
anya-e0703n:2353: Pacchato agataṃ disvā, bhītā tejena tassasā.
anya-e0703n:2356: Dhāvamānā saraṃ haṃ sā, sattakkhattuṃ parikkhipi.
anya-e0703n:2361: Taṃ saraṃ puna tikkhattuṃ, parikkhipi tato puna;
anya-e0703n:2362: Gaṅgaṃ kacchakatitthena, samotari tahiṃ tu so.
anya-e0703n:2365: Tassa puññānubhāvena, so ahosi mahā asi.
anya-e0703n:2368: Rajjaṃ gahetvā te dajjaṃ, sāmi māmaṃ amārayi.
anya-e0703n:2370: Gīvāya taṃ gahetvā so, vijjhitvā asikoṭiyā;
anya-e0703n:2371: Nāsāya rajjuyā bandhi, sā ahosi vasānugā.
anya-e0703n:2373: Gantvā taṃ dhumarakkhaṃ so, tamāruyha mahabbalo;
anya-e0703n:2374: Tattha cattāri vassāni, dhūmarakkhana ge vasi.
anya-e0703n:2389: Iti vatvāna pesesi, kumāro purato balaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2391: Gaṇhissāmi paviṭṭhanti, vissaṭṭhesu tu tesu so;
anya-e0703n:2398: Ghātetvā mātule ca’ttha, sīsarāsiṃ akaṃsu te.
anya-e0703n:2409: Attano rājagehaṃ so, tassa datvāna ayyako;
anya-e0703n:2410: Aññatthavāsaṃ kappesi, so tu tasmiṃ ghare vasi.
anya-e0703n:2428: Aghātayitvā jeṭṭhaṃ taṃ, mātulaṃ abhayaṃ pana.
anya-e0703n:2436: Saraṃ tañca khaṇāpetvā, kārāpesi bahū dakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:2440: Yakkhaṃ tu cittarājaṃ taṃ, heṭṭho abhayavāpiyā.
anya-e0703n:2448: Dāpesi chaṇakāle tu, cittarājena so saha;
anya-e0703n:2494: Sivikā sotthisālā ca, akāresi tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:2548: Ekā kusumā yaṭṭhītu, kusumāni tahiṃ pana;
anya-e0703n:2552: Nānā ca nānāvaṇṇā ca, sajīvā viya dissare.
anya-e0703n:2557: Muttāsamudā uggantvā, tīre vaṭṭi viya ṭhitā;
anya-e0703n:2564: Tāni disvā patīto so, rājā iti vicintayi.
anya-e0703n:2569: Devānaṃ piyatisso ca, dhammāsoko ca te ime;
anya-e0703n:2573: Dijaṃ amaccaṃ gaṇataṃ, rājā te caturo jane.
anya-e0703n:2576: Gāhā petvā anagghāni, ratanāni imāni so.
anya-e0703n:2578: Maṇijātī ca tisso tā, tisso ca rathayaṭṭhiyo;
anya-e0703n:2579: Saṅkhañca dakkhiṇāvattaṃ, muttā jātī ca aṭṭha tā.
anya-e0703n:2582: Sukhena titthaṃ laddhāna, sattāhena tato puna.
anya-e0703n:2585: Adaṃsu paṇṇākārete, disvā tāni pasīdi so.
anya-e0703n:2593: Tesaṃ anappake bhoge, datvā vāsagharāni ca;
anya-e0703n:2614: Ahaṃ buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato;
anya-e0703n:2627: Oruyha kūpaṃ passiṃsu, patvā dvādasiyaṃ idha.
anya-e0703n:2652: Pesesi kattike māse, tete there tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:2664: Suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ there dve, soṇamuttara meva ca.
anya-e0703n:2682: Vātā mahantā vāyanti, megho gajjati vassati.
anya-e0703n:2690: Sabbaṃ taṃ iddhiyā thero, paṭibāhiya bhiṃsanaṃ;
anya-e0703n:2693: Sadeva kopi ce loko, āgantvā tāsayeyya maṃ;
anya-e0703n:2694: Na me paṭibalo assa, janetuṃ bhayabheravaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2696: Sace’pi tvaṃ mahiṃ sabbaṃ, sasamuddaṃ sapabbataṃ;
anya-e0703n:2708: Paṇḍako nāma yakkho tu, saddhiṃhārita yakkhiyā;
anya-e0703n:2714: Karotha mettaṃ sattesu, vasantu manujā sukhaṃ;
anya-e0703n:2768: Gantvā catūhi therehi, desesi majjhimo isi;
anya-e0703n:2778: Suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ agamā, tasmiṃ tu samaye pana.
anya-e0703n:2788: Iti cintiya māretuṃ, sā yuvā upasaṅkamuṃ;
anya-e0703n:2791: Samaṇā mayaṃ himavantā, na rakkhasi sahāyakā;
anya-e0703n:2792: Rakkhasī sā saparisā, nikkhantā hoti sāgarā.
anya-e0703n:2798: Idaṃ imehi uddhanti, mantvā bhītā palāyisā.
anya-e0703n:2803: Saraṇesu ca sīlesu, aṭṭhaṃsu bahavo janā;
anya-e0703n:2839: Sampatvā mataraṃ passi, devī disvā piyaṃ sutaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2845: So asoka kumāro hi, ujjenīgamanā purā.
anya-e0703n:2847: Vedise nagare vāsaṃ, upagantvā tahiṃ subhaṃ;
anya-e0703n:2850: Saṃvāsaṃ tāya kappesi, gabbhaṃ gaṇhiya tena sā;
anya-e0703n:2851: Ujjeniyaṃ kumāraṃ taṃ, mahindaṃ janayī subhaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2854: Tasmiṃ kāle vasati sā, vedise nagare tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:2856: Thero tattha nisīditvā, kālaññū iti cintayi;
anya-e0703n:2871: Therena deviyā dhammaṃ, sutvā desitameva tu;
anya-e0703n:2877: Saddhiṃ tena gahaṭṭhena, na rato ñātihetunā;
anya-e0703n:2878: Tasmā vihārā ākāsaṃ, uggantvā so mahiddhiko.
anya-e0703n:2902: Rājā disvā ‘‘pamattaṃ taṃ, na yuttaṃ vijjhituṃ’’ iti;
anya-e0703n:2911: Bhīto aṭṭhāsi taṃ thero, ‘‘ehi tissāti abravi;
anya-e0703n:2917: Iccāha thero taṃ sutvā, rājā vītabhayo ahu;
anya-e0703n:2920: Dhanuṃ sarañca nikkhippa, upasaṅkamma taṃ isiṃ;
anya-e0703n:2923: Tadā tassa manussā te, āgamma parivārayuṃ;
anya-e0703n:2924: Tadā sese cha dassesi, mahāthero sahāgate.
anya-e0703n:2926: Te disvā abravī rājā, ‘‘kadā’’ me āgatā iti;
anya-e0703n:2927: ‘‘Mayā saddhiṃ’’ti therena, vutte pucchi idaṃ puna.
anya-e0703n:2939: Puṭṭho puṭṭho viyākāsi, taṃtaṃ pañhaṃ mahīpati.
anya-e0703n:2941: Rukkhoyaṃ rājakinnāmo, añño nāma ayaṃ taru;
anya-e0703n:2942: Imaṃ muñciya attha’mbo, santi ambatarū bahuṃ.
anya-e0703n:2945: Santi bhante bahu rukkhā, anambāpana te taru.
anya-e0703n:2947: Aññe ambe anambe ca, muñciya’tthi mahīruhā;
anya-e0703n:2950: Santi te ñātakā rāja, santi bhante bahujjanā;
anya-e0703n:2951: Santi aññātakā rāja, santi te ñātito bahū.
anya-e0703n:2953: Ñātake te ca aññe ca, muñciya’ññopi atthi nu;
anya-e0703n:2963: ‘‘Na bhuñjissa’’nti dāni me, iti janammi bhūpati.
anya-e0703n:2966: Na bhuñjāma idānī’ti, vutte kālañca pucchiso.
anya-e0703n:2969: Tuvaṃ gaccha mahārāja, vasissāma mayaṃ idha.
anya-e0703n:2971: Evaṃ sati kumāro’yaṃ, amhehi saha gacchatu;
anya-e0703n:2975: Idāni pabbajessāma, imaṃ tvaṃ gaccha bhūmipa.
anya-e0703n:2977: Pāto rathaṃ pesayissaṃ, tumhe tattha ṭhitā puraṃ;
anya-e0703n:2986: Thero taṃ gāmasīmāyaṃ, tasmiṃyeva khaṇe akā;
anya-e0703n:2990: Sumanaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ taṃ, thero āmantayī tato.
anya-e0703n:2993: Sāvento kittakaṃ ṭhānaṃ, bhante ghosema’haṃ iti.
anya-e0703n:2999: Bhuñjanto taṃ ravaṃ sutvā, therantika mapesayi.
anya-e0703n:3007: Tena ghosena devānaṃ, sannipāto mahā ahu;
anya-e0703n:3011: Bahū nāgā supaṇṇā ca, saraṇesu patiṭṭhayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:3016: Rājā pabhā te pāhesi, rathaṃ sārathi so gato;
anya-e0703n:3019: Nā’rohāma rathaṃ gaccha, gacchāma tava pacchato;
anya-e0703n:3037: Tadantare sārathi so, there disvā tahiṃ ṭhite;
anya-e0703n:3040: Gantvā rañño nivedesi, sutvā sabbaṃ mahīmati;
anya-e0703n:3052: Narindo pūjayanto te, there antepuraṃ nayi;
anya-e0703n:3065: Desesi thero tā itthī, paṭhamaṃ phalamajjhaguṃ.
anya-e0703n:3071: Sutvā pucchiya jānitvā, āha tesaṃ hitatthiko.
anya-e0703n:3082: Taṃ sutvāna pasīdiṃsu, nagarā te samāgatā;
anya-e0703n:3101: Nikkhamma dakkhiṇadvārā, thero tattha nisīdi ca;
anya-e0703n:3110: Tato therā nikkhamiṃsu, ‘‘yāma taṃ pabbataṃ’’ iti;
anya-e0703n:3125: Taṃ nandanā dakkhiṇena, nayaṃ theraṃ rathesabho;
anya-e0703n:3132: Puraṃ pāvisi therā tu, taṃ rattiṃ tattha te vasuṃ.
anya-e0703n:3135: There upacca vanditvā, pūjetvā kusumehi ca.
anya-e0703n:3137: Pucchi kacci sukhaṃ vuṭṭhaṃ, uyyānaṃ phāsukaṃ iti;
anya-e0703n:3138: Sukhaṃ vutthaṃ mahārāja, uyyānaṃ yati phāsukaṃ.
anya-e0703n:3140: Ārāmo kappate bhante, saṅghassā’’ti apucchi so;
anya-e0703n:3144: Taṃ sutvā abhihaṭṭho so, tuṭṭhahaṭṭho mahājano.
anya-e0703n:3161: Āgacchatū’ti pesehi, rañño no pitu santikaṃ;
anya-e0703n:3162: Pabbājessati sā therī, āgatā itthiyo imā.
anya-e0703n:3168: Mahiyā patite toye, akampittha mahā mahī.
anya-e0703n:3174: Thero rājagharaṃ gantvā, tassa dakkhiṇato ṭhito.
anya-e0703n:3177: Tatthāpi puthavī kampi, puṭṭho tassā’ha kāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0703n:3179: Ahosi tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ, kāle’pi idha mālako;
anya-e0703n:3183: Tattakā neva pupphāni, thero tatthāpi okiri.
anya-e0703n:3185: Tatthā’pi puthuvī kampi, puṭṭho tassā’ha kāraṇaṃ;
anya-e0703n:3189: Tattakehe’va pupphehi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ pūjayī isi.
anya-e0703n:3192: Rājā taṃ kāraṇaṃ pucchi, thero tassā’ha kāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0703n:3203: Tathāpi puthavī kampi, puṭṭho tassā’ha kāraṇaṃ;
anya-e0703n:3204: Saṅghassu posathā gāraṃ, idha hessati bhūmipa.
anya-e0703n:3218: Ambaṭṭhikaṃ adā rājā, taṃ sayaṃ tattha ropayi;
anya-e0703n:3221: Taṃ khaṇaṃyeva bījamhā, tamhā nikkhamma aṅkuro;
anya-e0703n:3224: Taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā, parisā sā sarājikā;
anya-e0703n:3227: Thero tadā pupphamuṭṭhi, aṭṭha tattha samokiri;
anya-e0703n:3236: Taṃ kampakāraṇaṃ pucchi, rājā thero viyākari;
anya-e0703n:3240: Idha ṭhapetvā bhojesuṃ, sasaṅghe sugate tayo.
anya-e0703n:3251: Thūpārahaṃ thalaṭhānaṃ, ahu there tahiṃ gate;
anya-e0703n:3255: Thero campakapupphehi, tehi pūjesi taṃ phalaṃ.
anya-e0703n:3257: Tatthāpi puthavī kampi, rājā taṃ kampakāraṇaṃ;
anya-e0703n:3263: Imamhi kappe paṭhamaṃ, kakusandho jino ahu;
anya-e0703n:3269: Kadamba nadiyā pāre, tattha rājā’bhayo ahu;
anya-e0703n:3275: Taṃ gantvā sattavinayaṃ, pavattiṃ sāsanassa ca;
anya-e0703n:3285: Sabbe maṃ ajja passantu, ojadīpamhi mānusā.
anya-e0703n:3291: Rājā ca nāgarā ceva, disvā khippaṃ upāgamuṃ.
anya-e0703n:3293: Devatā balidānatthaṃ, manussā ca tahiṃ gatā;
anya-e0703n:3296: Rājā so munirājaṃ taṃ, atihaṭṭho’bhi vādiya;
anya-e0703n:3302: Kārite maṇḍape ramme, pallaṅkesu vare sutaṃ;
anya-e0703n:3309: Santappesi sasaṅghaṃ taṃ, rājā so lokanāyakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:3311: Idheva pacchābhattaṃ taṃ, nisinnassa jinassa so;
anya-e0703n:3317: Ettheva so nisīditvā, dhammaṃ desesi nāyako;
anya-e0703n:3323: Nisinno tattha appetvā, samādhiṃ vuṭṭhito tato;
anya-e0703n:3326: Ādāya dakkhiṇaṃ sākhaṃ, bodhito me sirīsato;
anya-e0703n:3329: Tassa taṃ cittamaññāya, sā therī tadanantaraṃ;
anya-e0703n:3330: Gahetvā tattha rājānaṃ, upasaṅkamma taṃ taruṃ.
anya-e0703n:3339: Ṭhapesi dakkhiṇe hatthe, taṃ gahetvā tathāgato.
anya-e0703n:3353: Nisinno tattha appetvā, samādhiṃ vuṭṭhito tato.
anya-e0703n:3359: Datvā saparivāraṃ taṃ, ṭhapetvā idha bhikkhuniṃ.
anya-e0703n:3362: Ṭhapetvā idha sambuddho, tato pācinato pana.
anya-e0703n:3373: Samiddho nāma nāmena, tattha rājā tadā ahu;
anya-e0703n:3374: Nāmena varadīpo’ti, ayaṃ dīpo tadā ahu.
anya-e0703n:3379: Taṃ hutvā sattavinayaṃ, pavattiṃ sāsanassa ca;
anya-e0703n:3395: Rājā ca nāgarā ceva, disvā khippamupāgamuṃ.
anya-e0703n:3406: Kārite maṇḍape ramme, pallaṅkesu varesu taṃ;
anya-e0703n:3417: Idheva pacchābhattaṃ taṃ, nisinnassa jinassa so;
anya-e0703n:3423: Ettheva so nisīditvā, dhammaṃ desesi nāyako;
anya-e0703n:3424: Tadā tiṃsa sahassāni, pattā maggaphalaṃ narā.
anya-e0703n:3429: Nisinno tattha appetvā, samādhiṃ vuṭṭhito tato;
anya-e0703n:3435: Tassa taṃ cittamaññāya, sā therī tadanantaraṃ;
anya-e0703n:3436: Gahetvā tattha rājānaṃ, upasaṅkamma taṃ taruṃ.
anya-e0703n:3445: Ṭhapesi dakkhiṇe hatthe, taṃ gahetvā tathāgato.
anya-e0703n:3457: Nisinno tattha appetvā, samādhiṃ vuṭṭhito tato.
anya-e0703n:3459: Dhammaṃ desesi sambuddho, parisāya tahiṃ pana;
anya-e0703n:3463: Datvā saparivāraṃ taṃ, ṭhapetvā idha bhikkhuniṃ.
anya-e0703n:3471: Imamhi kappe tatiyaṃ, kassapo gottato jino;
anya-e0703n:3477: Jayanto nāma nāmena, tattha rājā tadā ahu;
anya-e0703n:3478: Nāmena maṇḍadīpoti, ayaṃ dīpo tadā ahu.
anya-e0703n:3480: Tadā jayantarañño ca, rañño kaniṭṭhabhātu ca;
anya-e0703n:3483: Kassapo so dasabalo, tena yuddhena pāṇinaṃ;
anya-e0703n:3486: Taṃ hantvā sattavinayaṃ, pavattiṃ sāsanassa ca;
anya-e0703n:3499: Rājā ca nāgarā ceva, disvā khippaṃ upāgamuṃ.
anya-e0703n:3505: Rājā ca so kumāro ca, yuddhamujjhiṃsu vimhitā.
anya-e0703n:3513: Kārite maṇḍape ramme, pallaṅkesu varesu taṃ;
anya-e0703n:3520: Sasantappesi sasaṅghaṃ taṃ, rājā so lokanāyakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:3522: Idhe’va pacchābhattaṃ taṃ, nisinnassa jinassa so;
anya-e0703n:3528: Ettheva so nisīditvā, dhammaṃ desesi nāyako;
anya-e0703n:3534: Nisinno tattha appetvā, samādhiṃ vuṭṭhito tato;
anya-e0703n:3540: Tassa taṃ cittamaññāya, sā therī tadanantaraṃ;
anya-e0703n:3541: Gahetvā tattha rājānaṃ, upasaṅkamma taṃ taruṃ.
anya-e0703n:3550: Ṭhapesi dakkhiṇe hatthe, taṃ gahetvā tathāgato.
anya-e0703n:3562: Nisinno tattha appetvā, samādhiṃ vuṭṭhito tato.
anya-e0703n:3564: Dhammaṃ desesi sambuddho, parisāya tahiṃ pana;
anya-e0703n:3568: Datvā saparivāraṃ taṃ; Ṭhapetvā idha bhikkhunī.
anya-e0703n:3576: Ahu imasmiṃ kappasmiṃ, catutthaṃ gotamo jino;
anya-e0703n:3601: Idha aññāni kiccāni, bahūni tava bhūmipa.
anya-e0703n:3603: Tāni kārehi nattāte, kāressati imaṃ pana;
anya-e0703n:3607: Rājā goṭṭhābhayo nāma, tassa putto bhavissati.
anya-e0703n:3610: Tassa rañño suto rāja, mahārājā bhavissati.
anya-e0703n:3615: Iccāha thero therassa, vacane ne’ttha bhūpati;
anya-e0703n:3624: Rañño ghare bhattakiccaṃ, katvā nikkhamma mandiraṃ;
anya-e0703n:3627: Suttaṃ janassa desetvā, sahassaṃ mānuse tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:3634: Tissārāmaṃ agā thero, rājā ca sutadesano.
anya-e0703n:3645: Tasmā katvā puraṃ anto-sīmaṃ bandhatha sajjukaṃ;
anya-e0703n:3654: Catutthe divase thero, rañño gehamhi bhuñjiya;
anya-e0703n:3660: Pāto bheriṃ carāpetvā, maṇḍayitvā puraṃ varaṃ;
anya-e0703n:3672: Mahāpadumo kuñjaro ca, ubho nāgā sumaṅgalā;
anya-e0703n:3693: Kenakena nimittena, sīmā ettha gatāti ce;
anya-e0703n:3697: Tato kumbalavāṭaṃ taṃ, mahānipaṃ tato agā.
anya-e0703n:3716: Tato marumbatittaṅgo, tato uddhaṃ nidiṃ agā;
anya-e0703n:3717: Paṭhama cetiya pācine, dve kadambā ajāyisuṃ.
anya-e0703n:3740: Pañcame divase thero, rañño gehamhi bhuñjiya;
anya-e0703n:3789: Therā passaya pariveṇaṃ, etaṃ tena pavuccati.
anya-e0703n:3822: Theraṃ tattha gataṃ sutvā, rathaṃ āruyha bhūpati;
anya-e0703n:3823: Deviyo dve ca ādāya, therassānupadaṃ akā.
anya-e0703n:3835: Kathesi rañño taṃ sutvā, bhāgineyyo ca rājino.
anya-e0703n:3846: Agamāsi puraṃ rājā, therā tattheva te vasuṃ;
anya-e0703n:3853: Sīmaṃ sīmātigo thero, bandhitvā tadaheva so.
anya-e0703n:3874: Ciradiṭṭho hi sambuddho, satthā no manujādhipa;
anya-e0703n:3875: Anāthavāsaṃ avasimha, natthi no pūjiyaṃ idha.
anya-e0703n:3878: Āha dhātūsu diṭṭhesu, diṭṭho hoti jino’’ iti.
anya-e0703n:3880: Vidito vo adhippāyo, thūpassa kāraṇe mayā;
anya-e0703n:3881: Kāressāmi ahaṃ thūpaṃ, tumhe jānātha dhātuyo.
anya-e0703n:3884: Rājā’ha sāmaṇeraṃ taṃ, kuto lacchāma dhātuyo.
anya-e0703n:3893: Icchāha sāmaṇero so, sumano taṃ sumānasaṃ.
anya-e0703n:3898: Ehi tvaṃ bhadra sumana, gantvā pupphapuraṃ varaṃ;
anya-e0703n:3899: Ayyakaṃ te mahārājaṃ, evaṃ no vacanaṃ vada.
anya-e0703n:3904: Munino dhātuyo dehi, pattaṃ bhuttañca satthunā;
anya-e0703n:3907: Pattapūrā gahetvā tā, gantvā devapuraṃ varaṃ;
anya-e0703n:3908: Sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ taṃ, evaṃ no vacanaṃ vada.
anya-e0703n:3913: Dāṭhaṃ tvameva pūjehi, akkhakaṃ dehi satthuno;
anya-e0703n:3931: Taṃ dhātuṃ dhātupattañca, ādāya sumano tato;
anya-e0703n:3937: Ṭhapesi dhātuyo sabbā, thero tattheva pabbate;
anya-e0703n:3938: Missakaṃ pabbataṃ tasmā, āhu cetiya pabbataṃ.
anya-e0703n:3943: Sacāyaṃ munino dhātu, chattaṃ namatu me sayaṃ;
anya-e0703n:3946: Sirasmiṃ me patiṭṭhātu, āgamma saha dhātuko;
anya-e0703n:3947: Iti rājā vicintesi, cintitaṃ taṃ tathā ahu.
anya-e0703n:3952: Haṭṭho hattī kuñcanādaṃ, akā kampittha medinī;
anya-e0703n:3956: Dakkhiṇena ca dvārena, nikkhamitvā tato puna.
anya-e0703n:3964: Manussadevo devehi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ rakkhitaṃ suciṃ;
anya-e0703n:3968: Nāgo na icchitaṃ rājā, theraṃ pucchittha taṃ manaṃ.
anya-e0703n:3971: Dhātuoropanaṃ tena, na iṭṭhamī’ti so bravi.
anya-e0703n:3990: Rattiṃ nāgo’nupariyāti, taṃ ṭhānaṃ so sadhātu kaṃ;
anya-e0703n:3997: Tato tato samanto ca, samāgami mahājano.
anya-e0703n:4030: Akāsi tasmā sā dhātu, tadā taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ.
anya-e0703n:4035: Patiṭṭhitāya tassā ca, dhātuyā cetiye tadā;
anya-e0703n:4041: Taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā, pasīdiṃsu jane janā;
anya-e0703n:4050: Tatho’patissagāmā ca, pañca pañca satāni ca;
anya-e0703n:4053: Evaṃ purā bāhirā ca, sabbe pabbajitā tadā;
anya-e0703n:4059: Rājorodhā khattiyā ca, amaccā nāgarā tathā;
anya-e0703n:4060: Sabbe janapadā ceva, pujā’kaṃsu visuṃ visuṃ.
anya-e0703n:4087: Sakkhissāmi ahaṃ deva, ānetuṃ taṃ duve tato;
anya-e0703n:4090: Evaṃ hotūti vatvāna, rājā taṃ tattha pesayi;
anya-e0703n:4091: So therassa ca rañño ca, sāsanaṃ gayha vandiya.
anya-e0703n:4121: Gantvā pitusamīpaṃ sā, therī theramataṃ bravī.
anya-e0703n:4123: Āha rājā tuvaṃ amma, apassanto kathaṃ ahaṃ;
anya-e0703n:4126: Āha sā me mahārāja, bhātuno vacanaṃ garu;
anya-e0703n:4127: Pabbājanīyā ca bahū, gantabbaṃ tattha tena me.
anya-e0703n:4130: Kathannu sākhaṃ gaṇissaṃ’’, iti rājā vicintayī.
anya-e0703n:4135: Bhante laṃkaṃ mahābodhi, pesetabbā nu kho iti;
anya-e0703n:4139: Ābhāsi rañño taṃ sutvā, tussitvā dharaṇīpati.
anya-e0703n:4213: Evaṃ satena mūlānaṃ, tattha sā gandhakaddame;
anya-e0703n:4225: Sayaṃ nādehi tūriyānaṃ, devesu mānusesu ca;
anya-e0703n:4237: Rājā oruyha pīṭhamhā, taṃ sattāhaṃ tahiṃ vasaṃ;
anya-e0703n:4253: Nānāpūjāhi sattāhaṃ, puna tattheva so vasi.
anya-e0703n:4261: Pūjento taṃ dinaṃyeva, upanetvā sakaṃ puraṃ;
anya-e0703n:4323: Eva mevā’bhi pūjetu, rājā rajjena me sakhā’’.
anya-e0703n:4325: Idaṃ vatvā mahārājā, tīre pañjaliko ṭhito;
anya-e0703n:4363: Tasmiṃṭhāne katā sālā, pakā setuṃ tamabbhutaṃ;
anya-e0703n:4390: Therassa sutvā kāretvā, saññāṇāni tahiṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:4394: Ṭhapāpetvā mahābodhiṃ, ṭhānesu tesu tesu ca.
anya-e0703n:4415: Uggantvāna ṭhitā muñci, chabbaṇṇā rasmiyo subhā.
anya-e0703n:4438: Sattāhā tikkame meghā, sabbe apagamiṃsu te;
anya-e0703n:4439: Mahābodhi ca dissittha, chabbaṇṇā raṃsiyopi ca.
anya-e0703n:4445: Tivakka brāhmaṇo ceva, dīpavāsī janāpi ca.
anya-e0703n:4463: Mahābodhi ṭhita ṭhāne, nāvāyo rohane tadā.
anya-e0703n:4487: Sasaṅghā saṅghamittā sā, mahātherī tahiṃ vasi.
anya-e0703n:4493: Ekasmiṃ piya mekasmiṃ, arittaṃ tehi teviduṃ.
anya-e0703n:4502: Hatthiṃ tattharataṃ ñatvā, akaṃsu tattha āḷhakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:4504: Atheka divasaṃ hatthī, nagaṇhi kabaḷāni so;
anya-e0703n:4505: Dīpappasādakaṃ theraṃ, rājā so pucchitaṃ mataṃ.
anya-e0703n:4510: Sadhātukaṃ tattha thūpaṃ, thūpassa gharameva ca;
anya-e0703n:4523: Gantvā tattha gataṃ sutvā, gantvāna tattha vandiya.
anya-e0703n:4526: Tassā ñatvā adhippāyaṃ, adhippāya vidū vidū.
anya-e0703n:4550: Tato dvādasame vasse, mahesī tassa rājino;
anya-e0703n:4556: Tato tu tatiye vasse, sābālā rūpamāninī;
anya-e0703n:4557: ‘‘Mayāpi ca ayaṃ rājā, mahābodhiṃ ma māyati’’.
anya-e0703n:4562: Tato ca tutthevassamhi, dhammā soko mahāyaso;
anya-e0703n:4565: Devānaṃ piyatisso tu, rājā dhammaguṇe rato;
anya-e0703n:4577: Hatthikkhandhe ṭhapetvā tā, dhātuyo idha āhara;
anya-e0703n:4578: Iti vutto satherena, tathā āhari dhātuyo.
anya-e0703n:4592: Yā yā mahāmahindena, therena vasitā guhā;
anya-e0703n:4628: Ayaṃ dīpo ahu ṭhito, vijite tassa rājino;
anya-e0703n:4631: Tassa’cca ye taṃ kaniṭṭho, uttiyo iti vissuto;
anya-e0703n:4632: Rājaputto aputtaṃ taṃ, rajjaṃ kāresi sādhukaṃ.
anya-e0703n:4638: Laṃkāyaso satthu kappo, katvā laṃkāhitaṃ bahuṃ.
anya-e0703n:4647: Tena taṃ divasaṃ nāma, aṭṭhamiyāti sammataṃ.]
anya-e0703n:4650: Gantvāna theraṃ vanditvā kanditvā bahudhā bahuṃ.
anya-e0703n:4677: Karonto tattha netvā taṃ, kūṭāgāraṃ manoramaṃ.
anya-e0703n:4683: Sabbesu ca vihāresu, thūpe kāresi khattiyo.
anya-e0703n:4700: Sabbā alaṅkatā laṃkā, therassa viya āsi ca;
anya-e0703n:4707: Thūpañca tattha kāresi, uttiyo so mahīpati.
anya-e0703n:4718: Dasavassāni so rājā, rajjaṃ kāresi uttiyo;
anya-e0703n:4721: Taṃ etaṃ atisāhasaṃ atibalaṃ na vāriyaṃ naro;
anya-e0703n:4723: Nibbindo viratiṃ ratiṃ na kurute pāpehi puññehi ca;
anya-e0703n:4732: Dasa vassāni kāresi, rajjaṃ sujana sevako.
anya-e0703n:4740: Dakkhiṇāya disāyaṃ so, vihāraṃ nagaraṃ gaṇaṃ;
anya-e0703n:4752: Pure rajjā ca rajje ca, saṭṭhīvassāni sādhukaṃ;
anya-e0703n:4762: Te gahetvā aselo tu, muṭasivassa atrajo.
anya-e0703n:4776: Eko putto ca dhītā ca, ahesuṃ tassa rājino;
anya-e0703n:4783: Rājā teneva cakkena, sīsaṃ puttassa chedayi.
anya-e0703n:4788: Āṇāpetvāna taṃ rājā, kucchiṃ tassa vidāḷiya;
anya-e0703n:4806: Thūpaṃ pākatikaṃ katvā, khamāpehī’’ti āhu taṃ.
anya-e0703n:4808: Te ṭhapetuṃ pañcadasa, pāsāṇe patite tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:4811: Akā mahallikā vīhiṃ, so setuṃ ātape khipi;
anya-e0703n:4812: Devo akāle vassitvā, tassā vihiṃ atemayi.
anya-e0703n:4814: Vīhiṃ gahetvā gantvā sā, ghaṇṭaṃ taṃ samaghaṭṭayi;
anya-e0703n:4827: Tatoppabhuti taṃ rajje, divā devo na vassatha.
anya-e0703n:4861: Puttaṃ janesi so tassa, bhātu nāma makārayi.
anya-e0703n:4871: Yaṭṭhālaya katisso so, tassa putto tadaccaye;
anya-e0703n:4872: Hattheva rajjaṃ kāresi, tassa putto’bhayo tathā.
anya-e0703n:4875: Tadaccaye tattha rajjaṃ, so akāresi khattiyo.
anya-e0703n:4880: Kalyāṇiyaṃ narindo hi, tisso nāmāsi khattiyo;
anya-e0703n:4884: Aññattha vasi so deso, tena taṃ nāmako ahu.
anya-e0703n:4887: Pāhesi deviyā gantvā, rājadvāre ṭhito tuso.
anya-e0703n:4892: Therena saddhiṃ bhuñjitvā, rañño saha viniggame;
anya-e0703n:4898: Theraṃ taṃ purisaṃ tañca, mārāpetvāna kodhasā;
anya-e0703n:4902: Attano dhītaraṃ yuddhaṃ, deviṃ nāma surupiniṃ.
anya-e0703n:4914: Upaṭṭhahi tadā saṅghaṃ, paccayehi catūhi so.
anya-e0703n:4920: Ṭhapesi tīṇi pāsāṇe, pāsāṇa phalakāni so.
anya-e0703n:4922: Adā pānīya dānañca, vattaṃ saṅghassa cā’kari;
anya-e0703n:4934: Tadā tatheva katvā sā, saṅghattherassa santike;
anya-e0703n:4935: Nisīdi dhammaṃ desento, thero taṃ idha mabravi.
anya-e0703n:4940: Evaṃ vutte tu sā āha, ‘‘kiṃ sampatti ayaṃ idha;
anya-e0703n:4941: Yesaṃ no dārakā natthi, vañjhāsampatti tena no’’.
anya-e0703n:4947: ‘‘Patthehi mama puttattaṃ, sampattī mahatī hi no’’.
anya-e0703n:4949: Na icchatīti ñatvāna, tadatthaṃ mahatiṃ subhaṃ;
anya-e0703n:4953: Nānā bhesajja vatthāni, saṅghe datvā’tha yācitaṃ.
anya-e0703n:4955: Patthesi so rājakulaṃ, sā taṃ ṭhānaṃ anekadhā;
anya-e0703n:4959: Tassā kucchimhi nibbatti, taṃ jāniya nivattisā.
anya-e0703n:4961: Rañño taṃ sāsanaṃ datvā, raññā saha punā’gamā;
anya-e0703n:4967: Tasse’vaṃ dohaḷo āhi, mahā puññāya mātuyā;
anya-e0703n:4980: Taṃ devī rājino āha, nemitte pucchi bhūpati.
anya-e0703n:4985: Edisaṃ madhugaṇḍaṃ so, dasseti tassa īdisiṃ;
anya-e0703n:4989: Nāvaṃ ñatvāna ācikkhi, rañño janapade naro.
anya-e0703n:4991: Rājā deviṃ tahiṃ netvā, maṇḍapamhi susaṅkhate;
anya-e0703n:4995: Veḷusumana nāmaṃ taṃ, yodhaṃ tattha niyojayi.
anya-e0703n:4998: Gopakena akā mettiṃ, tassa kiccañca sabbadā.
anya-e0703n:5000: Tassa vissattha taṃ ñatvā, pātova uppalāna’siṃ;
anya-e0703n:5006: Sutvā rājā gahetuṃ taṃ, mahā yodhānapesayi;
anya-e0703n:5015: Dohaḷe te ca sā devī, paribhuñji yathāruci;
anya-e0703n:5018: Sā devī samaye dhaññaṃ, janayī puttamuttamaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5019: Mahārājakule tasmiṃ, ānando ca mahā ahu.
anya-e0703n:5031: Kaṇḍulo iti ñāyittha, diṭṭhattā kaṇḍulena so.
anya-e0703n:5043: Sabbe te uddhapattañca, cīvaraṃ pārapantu ca.
anya-e0703n:5045: Paṭhamaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ pādaṃ, ummāranto ṭhapentu ca;
anya-e0703n:5048: Gotamo nāma thero ca, patiggaṇhātu puttakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5049: So ca saraṇasikkhā yo, detu’’ sabbaṃ tathā ahu.
anya-e0703n:5052: Datvā saṅghassa pāyāsaṃ, nāmaṃ puttassa kārayi.
anya-e0703n:5058: Saṅgamaṃ deviyā kāsi, tena gabbhamagaṇhi sā.
anya-e0703n:5060: Kāle jātaṃ sutaṃ rājā, tissanāmaṃ akārayi;
anya-e0703n:5070: Mā jīratu kucchigataṃ, idaṃ vo’’ti apāpayi.
anya-e0703n:5082: Na hessāmā’’ti cintetvā, bhāgaṃ bhuñjathi’manti ca.
anya-e0703n:5087: Amataṃ viya bhuñjiṃsu, te dve bhāge ubhopi ca;
anya-e0703n:5090: Evaṃ vuttetu tisso so, pāṇinā khipi bhojanaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5096: Pasāritaṅgo sayane, kiṃ nasesi sukhaṃ suta;
anya-e0703n:5136: Ummārātikkame nandi, sā chajjati yato tato.
anya-e0703n:5147: Damiḷānaṃ khayaṃ disvā, rañño ārocayiṃ sutaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5157: Iti gantvā gāmaṇissa, taṃ kumārassa sāvayi.
anya-e0703n:5159: Mātuyā mantayitvā so, sakkāraṃ tassa kārayi;
anya-e0703n:5160: Sakkato nandimitto so, yodho vasi tadantike.
anya-e0703n:5165: Ahu dīghābhayo nāma, rañño’ñña bhariyā suto;
anya-e0703n:5178: Rocayuṃ tassa gamanaṃ, na tu mātā pitā pana.
anya-e0703n:5183: So taṃ vimaṃsanatthāya, dūre kicce niyojayi;
anya-e0703n:5186: Brāhmaṇo kuṇḍalo nāma, vijja te me sahāyako;
anya-e0703n:5189: Gantvā taṃ tena dinnāni, bhaṇḍakāni idhā’hara;
anya-e0703n:5190: Iti vatvāna bhojetvā, lekhaṃ datvā vissajjayi.
anya-e0703n:5193: Pubbaṇheyeva gantvāna, so taṃ brāhmaṇa maddasa.
anya-e0703n:5204: Upāgami brāhmaṇaṃ taṃ, puṭṭho tenā’ha so gatiṃ;
anya-e0703n:5208: Sace jāneyya eḷāro, imaṃ hatthe karissati.
anya-e0703n:5213: Eva mevaṃ likhitvāna, lekhaṃ tassa samappayi;
anya-e0703n:5216: Datvā taṃ bhojayitvā ca, pesesī sakhisantikaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5235: So sabbaṃ ekato katvā, netvā mātāpitantikaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5239: Pabhāte rājaputto taṃ, sutvā tuṭṭhamano ahu.
anya-e0703n:5264: Tena so laddhasakkāro, yodho vasi tadantike.
anya-e0703n:5270: Karonti keḷiparihāsaṃ, tassa jeṭṭhā cha bhātaro.
anya-e0703n:5273: Tassa bhāgaṃ ṭhapetvāna, gantvā tassa nivedayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:5275: So gantvā taṃ khaṇaṃyeva, rukkhe imbarasaññite;
anya-e0703n:5276: Luñcitvāna samaṃ katvā, bhūmiṃ gantvā nivedayi.
anya-e0703n:5278: Gantvāna bhātaro tassa, disvā kammanta mabbhutaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5291: Kīḷamāno khipi tadā, so kīḷāguḷake viya.
anya-e0703n:5333: Gantvā ubho sakaṃ nāmaṃ, dārakassa akārayuṃ;
anya-e0703n:5334: Taṃ vuddhaṃ attano gehe, vāsesi siribhojako.
anya-e0703n:5336: Tasse’ko sindhavo posaṃ, kañcinā rohituṃ adā;
anya-e0703n:5337: Disvā tu veḷusumanaṃ, ayaṃ arohako mama.
anya-e0703n:5344: So assaṃ āruhitvā taṃ, sīghaṃ dhāvayi maṇḍale;
anya-e0703n:5345: Maṇḍale sakale asso, ekābaddho adissi so.
anya-e0703n:5350: Taṃ disvā parisā sabbā, ukkuṭṭhiṃ sampavattayi;
anya-e0703n:5360: Īsakaṃ pana khañjattā, khañjadevoti taṃ viduṃ.
anya-e0703n:5362: Migamaṃ gāmavāsīhi, saha gantvāna so tadā;
anya-e0703n:5366: Asumha bhūmiṃ cuṇṇeti, tesaṃ aṭṭhīni māṇavo.
anya-e0703n:5374: Gantvā saha kumārehi, vihāraṃ so kumārako;
anya-e0703n:5378: Ummattā viya āsuṃ te, bhītā sabbepi dārakā.
anya-e0703n:5380: Tena so āsi ummāda-phussa devoti pākaṭo;
anya-e0703n:5383: Saddavedhi vijjuvedhī, vālavedhī ca so ahu;
anya-e0703n:5390: Thale aṭṭhusabhaṃ yāti, jale tu usabhaṃ pana.
anya-e0703n:5405: Vahanto paṃsupiṇḍe so, lahuṃ vāpiṃ samāpayi.
anya-e0703n:5407: Tena so pākaṭo āsi, tampi ādāya bhūmipo;
anya-e0703n:5408: Datvā taṃ tassa sakkāraṃ, gāmaṇissa adāsi taṃ.
anya-e0703n:5425: Tathā tepā’nayuṃ yodhe, sabbe sampiṇḍitā tu te;
anya-e0703n:5453: Pitā me puriso honto, ne’vaṃ vakkhati teni’daṃ;
anya-e0703n:5457: Tāya taṃ bandhayissāmi, nā’ññathā rakkhiyo hi so.
anya-e0703n:5469: Sabbe yodhe samānetvā, kāresi sapathaṃ tadā.
anya-e0703n:5472: Akaṃsu sapathaṃ sabbe, taṃ yuddhaṃ tena nāgamuṃ.
anya-e0703n:5478: Netvā tissa mahārāmaṃ, taṃ saṅghassa nivedayi.
anya-e0703n:5502: Taṃ disvā ‘‘bhikkhusaṅghassa, kammaṃ’’ iti nivatti so.
anya-e0703n:5515: Thero piyaṅgu dīpaṭṭho, theraṃ tattha niyojayi;
anya-e0703n:5519: Saṅghassa bhāgaṃ sambhāgaṃ, rājā patte khipāpayi.
anya-e0703n:5521: Sambhāgaṃ khipi tisso ca, sambhāgaṃ vaḷavāpi ca;
anya-e0703n:5525: Adā gotamatherassa, so gantvā nabhasā lahuṃ.
anya-e0703n:5528: Pañcasatānaṃ so thero, laddhehi tu tadantikā.
anya-e0703n:5530: Bhāgehi pattaṃ pūretvā, ākāse khipi rājino;
anya-e0703n:5531: Disvā’ gataṃ gahetvā taṃ, tisso bhojisi bhūpatiṃ.
anya-e0703n:5534: Sattāhaṃ cumbaṭaṃ katvā, rājā pattaṃ visajjayi.
anya-e0703n:5536: Gantvāna so mahāgāmaṃ, samādāya balaṃ puna;
anya-e0703n:5540: Dve bhātaro samāgañchuṃ, yujjhamānā raṇe tadā.
anya-e0703n:5543: Tathāpi chiddaṃ no disvā, laṅghā petuṃ matiṃakā.
anya-e0703n:5546: Tomaraṃ khipi cammaṃva, yathā chijjati piṭṭhiyaṃ.
anya-e0703n:5549: Patiṃsu yuddhe yujjhantā, bhijja ceva mahabbalaṃ.
anya-e0703n:5563: ‘‘Mañce tattha mahārāja’’, iti thero avoca taṃ;
anya-e0703n:5564: Heṭṭhā mañceti jānitvā, tato nikkhamma bhūpati.
anya-e0703n:5566: Samantato vihārassa, rakkhaṃ kārayi taṃ pana;
anya-e0703n:5572: Nīyamānantu taṃ ñatvā, idha māha mahīpati;
anya-e0703n:5584: Nikkhāmito so bhikkhūhi, tissorāja suto pana;
anya-e0703n:5607: Janakkhayaṃ vināyeva, kalaho na bhaveyya no;
anya-e0703n:5608: Rājā saṅghassa doseso, bhaṃghe daṇḍaṃ karissati.
anya-e0703n:5638: Maṅgalañceva rakkhā ca, bhikkhūnaṃ dassanaṃ hino.
anya-e0703n:5653: Yujjhaṃ catūhi mā sehi, katahatthaṃ mahabbalaṃ.
anya-e0703n:5671: Gaṇhi khāṇuṃ khāṇugāme, dve tu tambuṇṇame pana.
anya-e0703n:5674: Jambucaggahī soso ca, gāmo’hu taṃ tadavhayo.
anya-e0703n:5697: Hatthinā nandimitto tu, yasmā yattha ayujjhi so;
anya-e0703n:5698: Tasmā tattha tato gāmo, hatthiporoti vuccati.
anya-e0703n:5700: Vīmaṃsitvā ubho rājā, vijitaṃ nagaraṃ agā;
anya-e0703n:5706: Dvāraṃ thakesuṃ damiḷā, rājā yodhe visajjayi;
anya-e0703n:5707: Kaṇṇulo nandimitto ca, suranimilo ca dakkhiṇe.
anya-e0703n:5726: Na idaṃ surāpāṇaṃ te, ayodvāra vighāṭanaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5729: So mānaṃ janayitvāna, koñcaṃ katvā gajuttamo;
anya-e0703n:5733: Rājā āruyha hatthiṃ taṃ, kumbhe phusiyapāṇinā.
anya-e0703n:5745: Saddhārabāhaṃ taṃ dvāraṃ, bhūmiyaṃ saravaṃ pati.
anya-e0703n:5760: Oloki suranimalaṃ, anicchaṃ sopi taṃ pathaṃ.
anya-e0703n:5771: Visuṃ visuṃ vīthigatā, damiḷe tattha cuṇṇayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:5774: Tatho girilakaṃ gantvā, giriyaṃ damiḷaṃ hani.
anya-e0703n:5797: ‘‘Suve yuddhaṃ karissāmi’’, iti te nicchayaṃ karuṃ.
anya-e0703n:5803: Abbhantare koṭṭhake tu, sayaṃ aṭṭhāsi bhūpati.
anya-e0703n:5823: ‘‘Chindā metaṃ saphalakaṃ’’, iti cintiya so pana;
anya-e0703n:5824: Phalakaṃ hani khaggena, taṃ muñciyi’ tarosayi.
anya-e0703n:5829: Saṅkhaṃ dhami phussadevo, senā bhijjittha dāmiḷi;
anya-e0703n:5832: Tattha vāpi jalaṃ āsi, hatānaṃ lohitā vilaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5833: Tasmā kulatthavā pīti, nāmato vissutaṃ ahu.
anya-e0703n:5844: Vijjhāpesi ca dantehi, taṃ hatthiṃ sakahatthinā;
anya-e0703n:5845: Tomaraṃ khipi eḷāraṃ, sahatthi tattha so pati.
anya-e0703n:5848: Laṃkaṃ ekātapattaṃ so, katvāna pāvisi puraṃ.
anya-e0703n:5850: Puramhi bheriṃ cāretvā, samantā yojane jane;
anya-e0703n:5862: Vijite nagare bhinne, yodho so dīghajattuko;
anya-e0703n:5871: Otiṇṇo so suṇitvāpi, patanaṃ tassa rājino;
anya-e0703n:5878: Hatthassa rathayo dhehi, pantīhi ca anunako.
anya-e0703n:5883: Pavatte tumūle yuddhe, sannaddho bhalluko tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:5887: Senāpi saddhiṃ teneva, paccosakki saniṃ saniṃ.
anya-e0703n:5890: Na paccosakki kiṃ etaṃ, phussadevā’’ti āha so.
anya-e0703n:5892: Jayo no paramo deva, jayabhūmi mayaṃ gajo;
anya-e0703n:5901: Mukhaṃ pidhāya khaggena, rājā akkosi taṃ pana;
anya-e0703n:5902: ‘‘Rañño mukhamhi pātemi’’, iti kaṇḍañca so khipi.
anya-e0703n:5904: Āhacca so khaggatalaṃ, kaṇḍo papati bhūmiyaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5907: Rañño pacchā nisinno bho, phussadevo mahabbalo;
anya-e0703n:5910: Rājānaṃ pādato katvā, patamānassa tassa tu;
anya-e0703n:5911: Khipitvā aparaṃ kaṇḍaṃ, vijjhitvā tassa jaṇḍukaṃ.
anya-e0703n:5917: Kaṇḍavalliṃ sakaṃ chetvā, pasataṃ lohitaṃ sayaṃ.
anya-e0703n:5919: Radhaññā dassesi taṃ disvā, rājā taṃ pucchi‘‘kiṃ’’iti;
anya-e0703n:5920: Rāja daṇḍo kato meti, so avoca mahīpati.
anya-e0703n:5927: Iti vatvā mahārājā, kataññu idha māha ca;
anya-e0703n:5930: Ghātetvā damiḷe sabbe, rājā laddhajayo kato;
anya-e0703n:5946: Kataṃ akkhobhiṇighātaṃ, saranto na sukhaṃ labhi.
anya-e0703n:5951: Āgamma te majjhāyāme, rāja dvāramhi otaruṃ;
anya-e0703n:5958: Tamassā sayituṃ amhe, iti rājā punā’hate.
anya-e0703n:5960: ‘‘Kathaṃ nu bhante assāso, mama hessati yena me;
anya-e0703n:5973: Vanditvā te visajjetvā, sayito puna cintayi.
anya-e0703n:5978: Adatvā bhikkhusaṅghassa, bhuttaṃ atthi nukho iti;
anya-e0703n:5982: Tadatthaṃ daṇḍakammaṃ me, kattabbanti ca cintayi.
anya-e0703n:5984: Ete tenekakoṭi idha manujagaṇe ghātite cintayitvā,
anya-e0703n:5985: Kāmānaṃ hetu etaṃ manasi ca kayirā sādhu ādīnavaṃ taṃ;
anya-e0703n:5986: Sabbesaṃ ghātaniṃ taṃ manasi ca kayirā’ niccataṃ sādhu sādhu,
anya-e0703n:5987: Evaṃ dukkhā pamokkhaṃ subhagati mahavā pāpuṇeyyā’cīrenāti.
anya-e0703n:6003: Icceva māha taṃ rājā, punappunaṃ nisedhayi;
anya-e0703n:6010: Rājā katā bhisekova, mahatā vibhavena so.
anya-e0703n:6024: Cāletuṃ taṃ na sakkhiṃsu, kuntaṃ rājādhikārikā;
anya-e0703n:6027: Rājā mahantaṃ accheraṃ, disvā taṃ haṭṭhamānaso;
anya-e0703n:6028: Vidhāya tattha ārakkhaṃ, pavisitvā puraṃ tato.
anya-e0703n:6033: Tīhi vassehi niṭhāsi, vihāro so narissaro;
anya-e0703n:6045: Patiggaṇhātu taṃ saṅgho, iti so dakkhiṇodakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:6048: Vihāre taṃ samantāpi, mahantaṃ maṇḍapaṃ subhaṃ;
anya-e0703n:6060: Ante sahassagghanako, sabba saṅgho ca taṃlabhi.
anya-e0703n:6062: Yuddhe dāne ca sūrena, sūrinā ratanattaye;
anya-e0703n:6081: Tato rājā vicintesi, vissutaṃ sussutaṃ sutaṃ;
anya-e0703n:6108: Dibbaṃ vimānaṃ pesetvā, tadā lekhaṃ adātha me’’;
anya-e0703n:6114: Bharaṇiṃ nāma dāsiṃ so, ‘‘niccaṃ dehī’’ti abravi;
anya-e0703n:6115: Datvā sā tāni sakkaccaṃ, yāvajīvaṃ tato cutā.
anya-e0703n:6132: Tāvatiṃsañca gacchantā, disvā theraṃ tameva te;
anya-e0703n:6133: Hiṅgulena tadā lekhaṃ, lekhayitvā paṭe tato.
anya-e0703n:6136: Saṅgho paṭaṃ gahetvā taṃ, pāhesi rājasantikaṃ.
anya-e0703n:6138: Taṃ disvā sumano rājā, āgammārāma muttamaṃ;
anya-e0703n:6162: Sahassaṃ tattha pāsādo, gabbhā āsuṃ susaṅkhatā;
anya-e0703n:6178: Sajjhumaye candimā ca, tārā ca muttakā mayā.
anya-e0703n:6198: Ācāma kumbhisovaṇṇā, uluṅko ca ahu tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:6199: Pāsāda paribhogesu, sesesu ca kathā’ vakā.
anya-e0703n:6218: Arahanto ca aṭṭhaṃsu, uddhaṃ catūsu bhūmisu.
anya-e0703n:6243: Āruyha rattiṃ bhuñjitvā, sayito iti cintayi.
anya-e0703n:6246: Na sakkā balimuddhattuṃ, taṃ vajjiya baliṃ ahaṃ.
anya-e0703n:6252: Devesu ñatvā taṃ sakko, vissakammāna mabravi.
anya-e0703n:6255: Gantvā purā yojanamhi, gambhīra nadī yantike.
anya-e0703n:6257: Māpehi iṭṭhikā tattaṃ’, iti sakke na bhāsito;
anya-e0703n:6260: Pabhāte luddako tattha, sunakhehi vanaṃ agā;
anya-e0703n:6264: Antarahitāya godhāya, iti cidhantasi so tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:6269: Tassa taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā, piyaṃ janahi tappiyo;
anya-e0703n:6278: Suvaṇṇa puṇṇaṃ taṃ bhūmiṃ, disvā saṅgāmavāsikā;
anya-e0703n:6279: Suvaṇṇa pāhiṃ ādāya, gantvā rañño nivedayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:6296: Nagare vāṇijo eko, ādāya sakaṭe bahū;
anya-e0703n:6302: Cāṭippamāṇa taṃ tattha, pakkabhārena nāmi taṃ;
anya-e0703n:6303: Disvā pana salaṭṭhiñca, pāsāṇaṭṭhañca taṃ phalaṃ.
anya-e0703n:6305: Vaṇṭe taṃ vāsiyā chetvā, dassāma’gganti cintiya;
anya-e0703n:6311: Muñjitvā’vāṭa puṇṇaṃ taṃ, yūsaṃ pattehī ādiya;
anya-e0703n:6319: Tesaṃ patte gahetvā so, pattāmiñjahi pūriya;
anya-e0703n:6320: Adāsi tesaṃ pakkāmuṃ, tayo eko napakkami.
anya-e0703n:6322: Rajataṃ tassa dassetuṃ, orohitvā tato hi so;
anya-e0703n:6328: Añjasā iminā tvampi, gaccha dānī upāsaka;
anya-e0703n:6329: Gantvāna theraṃ passitvā, veyyāvacca mahāsi ca.
anya-e0703n:6331: Thero ca leṇadvārena, tassa magga amāpayi;
anya-e0703n:6332: Theraṃ vandiya so tena, gacchanto leṇamaddasa.
anya-e0703n:6334: Leṇa dvāramhi ṭhatvāna, passitvā rajatampi so;
anya-e0703n:6347: Kevaṭṭā tā samekkhitvā, rāsiṃ katvāna ekato.
anya-e0703n:6352: Purato uttare passe, satta yojana matthake;
anya-e0703n:6358: Te disvā sunakho luddo, agantvā rājasantikaṃ;
anya-e0703n:6365: Ete vā rakkhake katvā, sabbāni āharāpayi.
anya-e0703n:6390: Mattikā sukhumā tattha, samantā tiṃ sayojane.
anya-e0703n:6420: Patiṭṭhāpessaṃ sve ettha, sabbo saṅgho sametuno.
anya-e0703n:6426: Cetiya ṭhāna bhūsāya, amacce ca niyojayi.
anya-e0703n:6435: Nahāpite nahāpake ca, appake ca bahūtathā.
anya-e0703n:6437: Vatthāni gandhamālā ca, annāni madhurāni ca;
anya-e0703n:6464: Thero’ sīti sahassāni, bhikkhū ādāya āgamā;
anya-e0703n:6488: Cattārīsata sahassāni, sahassāni ca saṭṭhi ca;
anya-e0703n:6492: Thero tiṃsa sahassāni, bhikkhū ādāya āgamā.
anya-e0703n:6513: Majjhe ṭhapetvā okāsaṃ, rañño aṭṭhaṃsu bhikkhavo.
anya-e0703n:6515: Pavisitvā tahiṃ rājā, bhikkhusaṅghaṃ tathā ṭhitaṃ;
anya-e0703n:6537: Iti so nāgataṃ passaṃ, mahantattaṃ nivārayi.
anya-e0703n:6549: Aṭṭhuttare aṭṭhuttare, vatthānaṃ tu sate pana.
anya-e0703n:6567: Vanditvā pūjayitvā ca, suppatito kamena so.
anya-e0703n:6597: Saṅgho taṃ nādhivāsesi, anupubbena so pana;
anya-e0703n:6604: Satthāhaṃ tattha saṅghassa, tato saṅghaṃ vissajjayi.
anya-e0703n:6606: Tato bheriṃ carāpetvā, iṭṭhakā vaḍḍhakī lahuṃ;
anya-e0703n:6609: Kathaṃ karissasi ne’ko, pucchito āha bhūpati;
anya-e0703n:6613: Tato upaḍḍhupaḍḍhañca, paṃsū dve ammaṇāni ca.
anya-e0703n:6615: Āhaṃsu rājā paṭibāhi, caturo tepi vaḍḍhakī;
anya-e0703n:6616: Atheko paṇḍito byatto, vaḍḍhakī āha bhūpatiṃ.
anya-e0703n:6624: ‘‘Kaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ cetiyaṃ taṃ, karissasi tuvaṃ iti;
anya-e0703n:6637: Iti rājā vicintesi, rattiṃñatvāna taṃ marū.
anya-e0703n:6661: Kamena rājā sutvāna, āgato pucchi vaḍḍhakī.
anya-e0703n:6664: Ekena mattikāpiṇḍaṃ, denti mayhaṃ ahaṃ pana.
anya-e0703n:6666: Ayaṃ āgantuko bhikkhu, ayaṃ nevāsiko iti;
anya-e0703n:6670: So balatassa dassesi, so taṃ rañño nivedayi.
anya-e0703n:6676: Balattho taṃ nivedesi, tadā taṃ jāni so yati.
anya-e0703n:6685: So taṃ tattha niyojesi, kolāhalamahosi ca.
anya-e0703n:6687: Rājā sutvāva’ taṃ āha, ‘‘ñātuṃ sakkā tamiṭṭhikaṃ’’;
anya-e0703n:6688: Jānantopi na sakkāti, rājānaṃ āha vaḍḍhakī.
anya-e0703n:6701: Rañño sabbaṃ nivedesi, rājā tassa adāpayi;
anya-e0703n:6707: Therena saha gantvā so, dissante piyagallake;
anya-e0703n:6713: Kulūpagassa therassa, gahitā me ime mayā;
anya-e0703n:6714: Vatthayugaṃtu puttassa, sabbe tāni dadāmi vo.
anya-e0703n:6716: Iti vatvāna datvā te, gahetvā gacchato pana;
anya-e0703n:6725: Ettheva bhatiyā kammaṃ, karitvā itthiyo duve;
anya-e0703n:6745: Mahāthūpe kataṃ kammaṃ, tassa āhaṃsu devatā;
anya-e0703n:6746: Evaṃ tathāgate heva, pasādo hi mahapphalo.
anya-e0703n:6751: Nava vāre citaṃ sabbaṃ, evaṃ osīdayiṃsu te;
anya-e0703n:6760: Kataṃ etaṃ mahārāja, na idāni karissate;
anya-e0703n:6769: Āharathā’’ti yojesi, te gantvā uttaraṃ kuruṃ;
anya-e0703n:6784: Aṭṭhārasa rataniko, khandho sākhāssa pañca ca;
anya-e0703n:6790: Atha maṅgalikā tassa, khandhe pupphalatāpi ca;
anya-e0703n:6794: Suvaṇṇa ghaṇṭāpantīdha, dāmāni ca tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:6854: Dahanaṃ agginibbānaṃ, tattha sakkāra meva ca.
anya-e0703n:6862: Catuddisaṃ te cattāro, mahārājā ṭhitā ahuṃ;
anya-e0703n:6863: Tettiṃsadeva puttā ca, bāttiṃsa ca kumāriyo.
anya-e0703n:6871: Padumādigāhakā devā, aññe devā ca nekadhā;
anya-e0703n:6872: Ratanagghiya panti ca, dhammacakkāna meva ca.
anya-e0703n:6896: Dhātu tassa vicuṇṇitaṃ janahitaṃ āsiṃsatā pūjiya;
anya-e0703n:6898: Tiṭṭhantaṃ sugataṃ viya’ssa munino dhātu ca sambūjaye.
anya-e0703n:6908: Dhātugabbhamhi kammāni, mayā niṭṭhāpi tāni hi;
anya-e0703n:6909: Suve dhātuṃ nidhessāmi, bhante jānātha dhātuyo’’.
anya-e0703n:6911: Idaṃ vatvā mahārājā, nagaraṃ pāvisī tato;
anya-e0703n:6929: Taṃ pāpuṇitvā gaṅgāya, jalaṃ pakkhili taṃ idha;
anya-e0703n:6930: Bhikkhū asaddahantā taṃ, satthuno taṃ nivedayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:6938: Idhā’netvā dassayitvā, janassa puna taṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:6942: Ussāpetvāna dassetvā, janassa khipi taṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:6947: Iti patthayi tenetaṃ, saṅgho soṇuttaraṃ yatiṃ;
anya-e0703n:6951: Kathesi saṅgho therassa, tassa tā dhātuyo iti.
anya-e0703n:6957: Ekaṃ doṇaṃ rāmagāme, koḷiyehi ca sakkataṃ.
anya-e0703n:6959: Nāgalokaṃ tato nitaṃ, tato nāgehi sakkataṃ;
anya-e0703n:6980: Samuddaṃ pavisitvāna, dvidhā bhinne jale tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:6983: Nāgā disvā karaṇḍaṃ taṃ, kāḷanāgassa rājino;
anya-e0703n:6987: Dhātū tā abhipūjento, netvāna bhavanaṃ sakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:6990: Māpetvā saha nāgehi, sadā pūjesi sādaro.
anya-e0703n:6995: Iccevaṃ saṅghavacanaṃ, sutvā sādhūti so pana;
anya-e0703n:6999: Cāresi nagare bheriṃ, sabba kiccaṃ vidhāya taṃ.
anya-e0703n:7014: Mahatā ca baloghena, hatthivā jirathehi ca.
anya-e0703n:7017: Āruyha surathaṃ aṭṭhā, suseta ca susindhavaṃ.
anya-e0703n:7047: Patvā’dhikāraṃ sabbaṃ so, saṅgha sandesa mabruvi.
anya-e0703n:7050: Tava hatthagatā dhātu, dehitā kira me tuvaṃ.
anya-e0703n:7052: Taṃ sutvā nāgarājāso, atīva domanassi to;
anya-e0703n:7070: Bahū devā ca nāgā ca, osariṃsu tahiṃ tadā;
anya-e0703n:7074: Ñatvā’naha theraṃ taṃ, dhātunatthi me santike iti.
anya-e0703n:7079: Aññathā saññāpetuṃ taṃ, theraṃ so uragādhipo;
anya-e0703n:7080: Ādāya cetiya gharaṃ, gantvā taṃ tassa vaṇṇayi.
anya-e0703n:7089: Dhātūnaṃ nayanaṃ nāma, nayuttaṃ bhikkhuvo idaṃ.
anya-e0703n:7097: Dhātunidhānaṃ ajje’va, so hi rājā karissati;
anya-e0703n:7098: Tasmā papañcamakaritvā, lahuṃ me dehi dhātuyo’’.
anya-e0703n:7101: Gahetvā yāhi taṃ thero, tikkhattuṃ taṃ bhaṇāpiya.
anya-e0703n:7118: Bhikkhu nāgassa vijaye, tuṭṭhā devā samāgatā;
anya-e0703n:7125: Te tena tuṭṭhā gantvāna, pūjā bhaṇḍāni āharuṃ.
anya-e0703n:7128: Ādāya saha devehi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ samupāgato.
anya-e0703n:7160: Mātūnaṃ purato ceva, tattha tattha ca pañcasu;
anya-e0703n:7167: Dhātuṃ pūjīya vanditvā, ṭhito pañcalīko tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:7196: Sayaṃ karaṇḍo vivari, uggantvā dhātuyo tato;
anya-e0703n:7208: Tato oruyha caṅkoṭo, rañño sīse patiṭṭhahi;
anya-e0703n:7221: Janassa saraṇaṃ hutvā, yadi ṭhassanti dhātuyo.
anya-e0703n:7226: Iti cintiya so dhātū, ṭhapesi sayanuttame;
anya-e0703n:7227: Tadā kārā dhātuyo ca, sahiṃsu sayanuttame.
anya-e0703n:7236: Laṃkāya rajjaṃ sakalaṃ, sattāhāni adāsi ca.
anya-e0703n:7251: Yathā sakaṃ gharaṃ yantu’’, taṃ yathādhiṭṭhitaṃ ahu.
anya-e0703n:7259: Saṅgho te dve sāmaṇere, tasmiṃ kamme niyojayi;
anya-e0703n:7263: Mā nibbāyantu dīpāva, mā kiñcāpi vivajjatu.
anya-e0703n:7321: Yo so na paccudāvatto, mahāyodho vasī mama.
anya-e0703n:7324: Idāni so maṃ no peti, thero theraputtabhayo.
anya-e0703n:7326: Iti cintayi sothero, jānitvā tassa cintitaṃ;
anya-e0703n:7332: Rājā disvā pasanno taṃ, purato ca nisīdiya;
anya-e0703n:7336: Maccusattuṃ parājetuṃ, na sakkomī’’ti āha ca.
anya-e0703n:7348: Upaṭṭhite devaloke, hitvā dibbaṃ sukhaṃ tuvaṃ.
anya-e0703n:7350: Idhāgamma bahuṃ puññaṃ, akāsi ca anekadhā;
anya-e0703n:7359: Tadā ca āharāpetvā, pahaṭṭho puñña potthakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:7360: Vācetuṃ lekhakaṃ āha, so taṃ vācesi potthakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:7406: Ghate pakke mahājāla, pūve ṭhānamhi tattake;
anya-e0703n:7407: Tatheva saha bhattehi, nicca emava adāpayiṃ.
anya-e0703n:7409: Uposathesu divasesu, māse māse ca aṭṭhasu;
anya-e0703n:7428: Dinna dāna dvayaṃyeva, taṃ me hāsesi mānasaṃ.
anya-e0703n:7430: Taṃ sutvā abhayo thero, taṃ dānadvayameva so;
anya-e0703n:7436: Navannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ, datvā taṃ paribhuñji so;
anya-e0703n:7437: Pathavīcālako dhamma, suttathero tu taṃ pana.
anya-e0703n:7455: Rājā cittaṃ pasādetvā, taṃ theraṃ idha mabruvi.
anya-e0703n:7458: Aha mevaṃ hotu kāyo’pi, saṅghassa upakārako.
anya-e0703n:7464: Niṭṭhāpehi tuvaṃ sabbaṃ, kammaṃ sakkacca sādhukaṃ.
anya-e0703n:7466: Sāyaṃ pāto ca pupphāni, mahāthūpamhi pūjaya;
anya-e0703n:7469: Paṭiyāditañca yaṃ vattaṃ, mayā sugata sāsane;
anya-e0703n:7470: Sabbaṃ aparihāpetvā, tāta vattaya taṃ tuvaṃ.
anya-e0703n:7472: Saṅghassa tāta kiccesu, mā pamajjittha sabbadā’’;
anya-e0703n:7473: Itaṃ taṃ anusāsitvā, tuṇhī āsi mahīpati.
anya-e0703n:7476: Devatā cha rathe ceva, chahi devehi ānayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:7478: Yācuṃ visuṃ visuṃ devā, rājānaṃ te rathe ṭhitā;
anya-e0703n:7481: Rājā tesaṃ vaco sutvā, ‘‘yāva dhammaṃ suṇomahaṃ;
anya-e0703n:7488: Rājā ‘‘netaṃ tathā bhante’’, iti vatvāna taṃ vadi.
anya-e0703n:7490: Taṃ sutvāna janā keci, ‘‘bhīto maccubhayā ayaṃ;
anya-e0703n:7497: Tāni laggāni lambiṃsu, rathīsāsu visuṃ visuṃ.
anya-e0703n:7508: Metteyyo bodhisatto hi, vasate tusite pure.
anya-e0703n:7520: Katvāna thūpaṃ saṅghañca, vanditvā tusitaṃ agā.
anya-e0703n:7529: So eva māḷako ettha, vuccate ‘‘rāja māḷako’’.
anya-e0703n:7546: So saggaṃ sakale rami vo payāti tasmā,
anya-e0703n:7557: Atīva dhañño so āsi, puññakammarato sadā;
anya-e0703n:7590: Evaṃ puññāni katvā so, anekāni mahīpati;
anya-e0703n:7665: Tiyo nāma brāhmaṇassa, vaco sutvā apaṇḍito;
anya-e0703n:7666: Coro asu mahātassa, parivāro ahosi ca.
anya-e0703n:7674: ‘‘Rajjaṃ tava idāneva, gaṇha tvaṃ damiḷe’’ iti;
anya-e0703n:7675: Sādhūti so damiḷehi, yujjhi gaṇhiṃsu te tu taṃ.
anya-e0703n:7677: Tato te damiḷā yuddhaṃ, raññā saha pavattayuṃ;
anya-e0703n:7682: Vāsito ca tadā āsi, ekavīsati rājusū.
anya-e0703n:7688: Vihāraṃ ettha kāressaṃ’’, iccevaṃ cintayī tadā.
anya-e0703n:7699: Asakkuṇitvā gāhetuṃ, pattaṃ bhuttaṃ jinena taṃ;
anya-e0703n:7726: Puḷahatthaṃ gahetvā taṃ, dūre vassāni bāhīyo;
anya-e0703n:7735: Pīḷayamāraṃ gahetvā so, dāṭhiyo damiḷo pana;
anya-e0703n:7747: Deviyā vacanaṃ sutvā, tassa āgamanā purā;
anya-e0703n:7750: Dhanuṃ sandhāya āyantaṃ, sīvaṃ vijjhi mahāsīvo;
anya-e0703n:7780: Damiḷehi vā’tha raññā, iti puṭṭhā tu te pana.
anya-e0703n:7783: Ubho tissa mahātissa-therā ādāya te tato.
anya-e0703n:7786: Rājā ca te amaccā ca, thero eva mayācayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:7788: Siddhe kamme pesiteno, gantabbaṃ santikaṃ iti;
anya-e0703n:7804: Taṃ mahātissa therassa, vihāraṃ mānado adā.
anya-e0703n:7806: Girissa yasmā gārāme, rājā kāresi sobhayo;
anya-e0703n:7814: Rathā oropitā sā hi, tasmiṃṭhāne varaṅganā;
anya-e0703n:7818: Rājā tassa vaco sutvā, vihāraṃ tattha kārayi.
anya-e0703n:7825: Tesu sattasu yodhesu, uttiyo nāma kārayi;
anya-e0703n:7829: Amacco kārayī tena, sopi taṃnāmako ahu.
anya-e0703n:7838: Vihāre dema tumhākaṃ, iti vatvā adaṃsu ca.
anya-e0703n:7840: Thero sabbatthavāsesi, te te bhikkhū yathā rahaṃ;
anya-e0703n:7844: Paccayehi anunehi, tena te bahavo ahuṃ.
anya-e0703n:7847: Kulasaṃsaṭṭha dosena, saṅgho taṃ nīhari ito.
anya-e0703n:7858: Evaṃ te theravādīhi, pabhinnā bhikkhavo dvidhā.
anya-e0703n:7869: Hāniṃ disvāna sattānaṃ, tadā bhikkhū samāgatā;
anya-e0703n:7886: Rajjaṃ cuddasavassāni, dhammena ca samena ca.
anya-e0703n:7888: Sahatthena kataṃ dānaṃ, so sutvāna mahapphalaṃ;
anya-e0703n:7897: Te guḷe āharāpetvā, puraṃ āgamma bhūpati;
anya-e0703n:7912: Evaṃ saddhāya so rājā, katvā puññāninekadhā;
anya-e0703n:7939: Rattā vīsena taṃ hantvā, vaṭuke rajjamappayi;
anya-e0703n:7940: Vaṭuko damiḷo so hi, pure nagaravaḍḍhakī.
anya-e0703n:7943: Rajjaṃ kāresi nagare, anulā tattha āgataṃ.
anya-e0703n:7946: Hantvā visena vaṭukaṃ, tassa rajjaṃ samappayi.
anya-e0703n:7958: Taṃ mahesiṃ karitvāna, niccaṃ tāya upaṭṭhito.
anya-e0703n:7991: Kāresi dantagehanti, vissato āsi tena so.
anya-e0703n:8033: Therā dvāraṃ māpayitvā, dhātugabbhaṃ nayiṃsu taṃ.
anya-e0703n:8051: Tatheva paṭṭavaṭṭīnaṃ, su bahūhi sikhāhi ca.
anya-e0703n:8098: Cajitvāna sakaṃ pāṇaṃ, nipajjitvā sayaṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:8111: Dhajagghika to raṇāni, maṇḍayitvā tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:8125: Cetiyassa mahetena, pūjā sā kāritā subhā;
anya-e0703n:8140: Attānaṃ deviṃputte dve, hatthiṃ assañca maṅgalaṃ;
anya-e0703n:8162: Tuṭṭho vihāraṃ dāpesi, saṅghe bhogaṃ tatheva so.
anya-e0703n:8199: Tīṇi vassāni nagare, rajjaṃ kāresi khattiyo.
anya-e0703n:8222: Tahiṃ adisvā te rājā, kuddho tehi akārayi;
anya-e0703n:8225: Tesaṃ vicārake katvā, caṇḍāle ca ṭhapāpayi;
anya-e0703n:8228: Rājānaṃ taṃ gahetvāna, rundhitvāna sake ghare;
anya-e0703n:8229: Sayaṃ rajjaṃ vicāresuṃ, rañño devī tadā sakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:8234: Pesesi vatvā sandesaṃ, netvā taṃ dhātiyo tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:8245: Dukkhito so ruditvāna, nāgo bhetvāna āḷakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:8251: Nāvaṃ āro payitvāna, rājānaṃ tattha kuñjaro;
anya-e0703n:8272: So gahetvā balaṃ rājā, yuddhāya abhinikkhami;
anya-e0703n:8273: Taṃ sutvā lambakaṇṇā ca, yuddhāya abhisaṃyutā.
anya-e0703n:8279: Rājā nāmaṃ sāvayitvā, sayaṃ pāvisi tena so.
anya-e0703n:8299: Goṇā eterathe yuttā, tava honti rathesabha;
anya-e0703n:8317: Tassa rañño mahesī ca, saṅgāme pattimattano;
anya-e0703n:8320: Taṃ tissavāpī kīḷāya, hantvā candamukhaṃ sivaṃ;
anya-e0703n:8329: Subhaṃ balatthaṃ taṃ rājā, rājabhūsāya bhūsiya;
anya-e0703n:8333: Yaṭṭhiṃ gahetvā hatthena, dvāramūle ṭhito sayaṃ.
anya-e0703n:8336: Rājā hasati evaṃ so, kurute antarantarā.
anya-e0703n:8339: Ayaṃ balattho kasmā me, sammukhāhasatī’’ti so.
anya-e0703n:8341: Mārāpayitvā rājānaṃ, balattho so subho idha;
anya-e0703n:8366: Vatvā rahassaṃ datvā ca, sahassaṃ taṃ palāpayi.
anya-e0703n:8371: Tato paraṃ kuṭṭhino ca, rājabhāvāya nicchitaṃ;
anya-e0703n:8378: So rājā dvīhi vassehi, āgamma purasantikaṃ.
anya-e0703n:8380: Subharājaṃ raṇe hantvā, vasabho so mahabbalo;
anya-e0703n:8390: Saṅghaṃ so sannipātetvā, vanditvā pucchi bhūpati.
anya-e0703n:8402: Rājā sādhūti gantvāna, tathā sabbaṃ makāsi so.
anya-e0703n:8443: Tassa rañño mahesī sā, vuttanāmā manoramaṃ;
anya-e0703n:8467: Pure bahū pokkharaṇī, kārāpetvā tahiṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:8483: Sakammaṃ karato tassa, bhattaṃ āhari dārikā.
anya-e0703n:8486: Sattame divase disvā, bhattaṃ medhāvīnī adā.
anya-e0703n:8495: Sareyyāsī’ti thero tu, tadā ca parinibbuto.
anya-e0703n:8497: Sake so vasabho rājā, vayappattamhi puttake;
anya-e0703n:8507: Rājā tuṭṭho sutassā’dā, taṃ sādhu katamaṅgalaṃ.
anya-e0703n:8515: Mahāmattā tu devī sā, sarantī therabhāsitaṃ;
anya-e0703n:8624: Kuḍḍanāgassa rañño tu, devīyā bhātuko tadā;
anya-e0703n:8645: Ṭhapesi so hi vohāraṃ, hiṃsā muttaṃ yatoidha;
anya-e0703n:8646: Vohāraka tissarājā, iti nāmaṃ tato ahu.
anya-e0703n:8658: Māse māse sahassaṃ so, mahāvihārassa dāpayi.
anya-e0703n:8676: Dāna vaṭṭaṃ ṭhapāpesi, saddhamme gāravena so.
anya-e0703n:8681: Mahā vesākha pūjaṃ so, kāretvā dīpavāsinaṃ;
anya-e0703n:8688: Deviyā tassa saṃsaṭṭho, ñāto bhīto sabhātarā.
anya-e0703n:8700: Abhayo taṃ jānanatthaṃ, dūtaṃ idha visajjayi.
anya-e0703n:8702: Taṃ disvā pūgarukkhaṃ so, samantā kuntanāḷiyā;
anya-e0703n:8706: Dūto gantvā abhayassa, taṃ pavattiṃ pavedayi.
anya-e0703n:8708: Ñatvā’bhayo taṃ damiḷe, ādāya basuke tato;
anya-e0703n:8742: Taṃ sutvā abhayo pacchā, yanto pucchi punāhaso.
anya-e0703n:8749: Te puraṃ pavisitvāna, tayo rañño’ti vallabho;
anya-e0703n:8777: Visaṃ phalesu yo jesuṃ, rājabhojjāya jambuyā.
anya-e0703n:8779: Khāditvā jambupakkāni, tāni tattheva so mato;
anya-e0703n:8789: Nipajji bhūmiyaṃ rājā, katvāna iti nicchayaṃ.
anya-e0703n:8794: Evaṃ nipanne bhūminde, devo pāvassi tāvade;
anya-e0703n:8800: Tato jalamhi pilavaṃ, rājā vuṭṭhāsi dhammiko;
anya-e0703n:8803: Corātahiṃ tahiṃ jātā, iti sutvāna bhūpati;
anya-e0703n:8809: Eko yakkho idhāgamma, rattakkho iti vissuto;
anya-e0703n:8818: ‘‘Apassitvāna taṃ yakkhaṃ, na cuṭṭhāmī’’ti so sayi;
anya-e0703n:8819: Tassa so dhammatejena, agā yakkho tadantikaṃ.
anya-e0703n:8822: ‘‘Kasmā pajaṃ me bhakkhesi, mā khāda’’iti sobravi.
anya-e0703n:8825: ‘‘Na sakkā iti vutte so, kamenekaṃti abravi.
anya-e0703n:8827: ‘‘Aññaṃ na sakkā dātuṃ me, maṃ khāda’’ iti sobravi;
anya-e0703n:8828: ‘‘Na sakkā’’iti taṃ yāci, gāme gāme baliñca so.
anya-e0703n:8830: Sādhūti vatvā bhūmindo, dipampi sakalepi ca;
anya-e0703n:8851: Goṭṭhābhayassa dassehi, bahuṃ dassati te dhanaṃ.
anya-e0703n:8854: Nisinnoyeva amari, so sīsaṃ tassa ādiya.
anya-e0703n:8857: Datvā tassa dhanaṃ rañño, sakkāraṃ sādhukārayi.
anya-e0703n:8863: Kārayitvā maṇḍayitvā, so bhikkhu tattha saṅghato.
anya-e0703n:8896: Pāpakānaṃ niggahena, sodhento sāsanaṃ tu so.
anya-e0703n:8913: Rañño kulūpago āsi, rājā tasmiṃ pasīdiya;
anya-e0703n:8916: Appesi tassa bhikkhussa, so saṅgaṇhi dutiyakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:8925: Tato amacce katvāna, sayaṃ hutvāna pacchato;
anya-e0703n:8932: Saṅghamittotu so bhikkhu, bhīto tasmiṃ narādhipā.
anya-e0703n:8943: Maṇi duve mahagghe ca, mahāthūpe apūjayi;
anya-e0703n:8986: Vinayavādī mayaṃ rāja, iti gāhiya bhūpabhiṃ.
anya-e0703n:8989: Yo so sataṃ daṇḍiyo’ti, raññā daṇḍaṃ ṭhapāpayi.
anya-e0703n:8998: Rājānaṃ saññāpetvā so, thero dummati dummatiṃ.
anya-e0703n:9001: Tathā kātuṃ manusse so, yojesi duṭṭhamānaso.
anya-e0703n:9004: Soṇāmacco dāraṇo ca, bhikkhavo ca alajjino.
anya-e0703n:9013: Āgamma subahuṃ pāpaṃ, akāsi so mahīpati.
anya-e0703n:9030: Tatrā’gataṃ taṃ sutvā, sahāyaṃ so mahīpati;
anya-e0703n:9036: Ādāya taṃ sayaṃyeva, rattiṃ nikkhamma ekako;
anya-e0703n:9040: ‘‘Kasmā coro ahu me tvaṃ, ‘‘iti rājā apucchitaṃ.
anya-e0703n:9045: Iccheva mabravī rājā, rājānaṃ so khamāpayi;
anya-e0703n:9067: Kāretvā loharūpāni, ṭhapāpesi duve tu so.
anya-e0703n:9079: Kopetuṃ bhikkhavo keci, nilīyiṃsu tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:9130: Ahiṃ vā’si visaṃ khippaṃ, kareyya’tthahitaṃ budho.
anya-e0703n:9132: Ahu rājā sirimegha-vaṇṇo tassa suto tato;
anya-e0703n:9141: Kiṃ kimevā’’ti āhaṃsu, bhikkhavo taṃ narissaraṃ;
anya-e0703n:9147: Amacco soṇāmacco ca, saṅghamitto ca pāpiyo;
anya-e0703n:9156: Taṃ sutvā pitukammaṃ so, nibbinno bālasaṅgame;
anya-e0703n:9157: Pitarā nāsitaṃ tattha, sabbaṃ pākatikaṃ akā.
anya-e0703n:9181: Tatraṭṭhame nivāsetvā, tato tu navame pana.
anya-e0703n:9186: Laṃkādīpe ca sakale, sabbe ādāya bhikkhavo;
anya-e0703n:9198: Vissajjetvā tahiṃ bhogaṃ, sabbaṃ therassa so pitā;
anya-e0703n:9207: Tamhā oruyha so mahā, sayaṃ hutvā purecaro;
anya-e0703n:9220: Tīhaṃ tatthāpi vāsesi, bimbaṃ taṃ jinasununo.
anya-e0703n:9225: Paṭimaṃ nīharitvā taṃ, vihāraṃ sotthiyā karaṃ;
anya-e0703n:9253: Gahetvā bahumānena, katvā sammā na muttamaṃ.
anya-e0703n:9259: Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ gehaṃ, dāṭhādhātugharaṃ ahu.
anya-e0703n:9265: Tassa pūjāvidhiṃ kātu, meva rūpaṃ niyojayi.
anya-e0703n:9271: Aṭṭhavīsatime vasse, gabho so tassa yā gati.
anya-e0703n:9283: Citradantamayaṃ kiñci, tassa kammaṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:9288: Buddhadāso tato tassa, putto āsi mahīpati;
anya-e0703n:9301: Pitā’va putte so satte, anukampittha bhūpati.
anya-e0703n:9324: Tasmā phusitvā taṃ kammaṃ, kātuṃ sakkā na te mayā;
anya-e0703n:9327: Evaṃ putte phaṇindo so, kevalaṃ phaṇamattano;
anya-e0703n:9331: Satthaṃ gahetvā phāletvā, udaraṃ tassa bhogino.
anya-e0703n:9333: Nīharitvā tato dosaṃ, katvā bhesajja muttamaṃ;
anya-e0703n:9334: Sappaṃ taṃ taṅkhaṇeneva, akāsi sukhitaṃ tadā.
anya-e0703n:9337: Tiracchānāpi jāniṃsu, sādhu rajjanti me kataṃ.
anya-e0703n:9343: Miṇiṃ taṃ nayanaṃ rājā, vihāre abhayuttare.
anya-e0703n:9349: Pāṇakā balavo hutvā, udaraṃ tassa khādisuṃ.
anya-e0703n:9351: Tato so upasaṅkamma, taṃ nivedesi rājino;
anya-e0703n:9354: So āha’’ thusavitthimhi, gāme khīrena bhojane;
anya-e0703n:9358: Rājā tassa sirāvedhaṃ, katvā ādāya lohitaṃ.
anya-e0703n:9374: Anto tu ditthatuṇḍena, tena dukkhena pīḷito;
anya-e0703n:9375: Rājānaṃ magamā rājā, nidānaṃ tassa pucchiya.
anya-e0703n:9377: Anto tu ditthatuṇḍena, tena dukkhena pīḷito;
anya-e0703n:9378: Rājānaṃ magamā rājā, nidānaṃ tassa pucchiya.
anya-e0703n:9384: Vivaritvā tadā sutto, tato tassa mukhantike.
anya-e0703n:9393: Kammaṃ vijjati lokassa, kataṃ kiṃtena dukkaraṃ.
anya-e0703n:9396: Sabbādarena kubbanto, aho puñño dayo mama.
anya-e0703n:9399: Jātaṃ sattasu vāresu, sagabbhaṃ sukhitaṃ akā.
anya-e0703n:9407: Bhijjitvā āsi maṇḍūko, so vuddho tattha gacchati;
anya-e0703n:9418: Yojesi vejja mekekaṃ, rājā gāma dvipañcake.
anya-e0703n:9424: Kāresi saha bhogena, sālāyo ca mahāpathe.
anya-e0703n:9430: Diṭṭhe diṭṭhe pamocesi, dukkhamhā dukkhite jane.
anya-e0703n:9433: Saddhiṃ gacchati senāya, devehi viya vāsavo.
anya-e0703n:9435: Taṃ disvā sirisobhagga-maggaṃ pattaṃ mahī patiṃ;
anya-e0703n:9451: ‘‘Ruṭṭho kimatthaṃ bho tva’’nti, pucchi sabbamavoca so.
anya-e0703n:9454: Avamaññāya maṃ mayhaṃ, parato to yāti hatthinā.
anya-e0703n:9457: Hatthaṃ me eti kāretvā, sabbaṃ dāsāna niggahaṃ.
anya-e0703n:9459: No ce hatthaṃ mamā’yāti, māretvā galalohitaṃ;
anya-e0703n:9460: Pivissāmi na sandeho, na cireneva passasi’’.
anya-e0703n:9462: So gantvā narapālassa, pavattiṃ taṃ nivedayi;
anya-e0703n:9471: Alabhanto sahāyaṃ me, nāsakkhi tassa ghātane;
anya-e0703n:9474: Etha gehe vasitvā me, hotha me anuvattakā;
anya-e0703n:9477: Iti vatvāna taṃ kuṭṭhaṃ, netvā so gharamattano;
anya-e0703n:9490: Matoti sutvā tassā-si hadayaṃ phalitaṃ dvidhā.
anya-e0703n:9528: Karonto tañca so rājā, mākhijjantu janā iti;
anya-e0703n:9540: Ñatvā amacco taṃ netvā, uyyānaṃ jādayīgharaṃ;
anya-e0703n:9541: Evaṃ paṭicca attānaṃ, dukkhaṃ nākāsi pāṇinaṃ.
anya-e0703n:9547: Loke lokahitaṃ natthi, kataṃ kiñci mahesīnā.
anya-e0703n:9562: Bhaṇantā ratanaṃ suttaṃ, siñcamānā jalaṃ tathā.
